anya-e0702n0:660_1: Pituno rājagehaṃ bhinditvā vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tilokālaṅkārassa nāma mahātherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:660_2: Tilokālaṅkāratthero ca nāma tipiṭakālaṅkārattherena samaññāṇathāmassa ariyālaṅkārattherassa sissoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0702n0:660_5: So ca thero niruttisāramañjūsaṃ nāma nyāsasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ akāsī.
anya-e0702n0:661_0: Kaliyuge dvādasādhike vassasahasse sampatte phaggunamāse sotāpannā nāma ārakkhadevatā aññattha gamissāmāti
anya-e0702n0:661_1: āhaṃsūti nagarā supinaṃ passantā hutvā bahūsannipatitvā devapūjaṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:662_0: Tasmiñca kāle cinarañño yodhā āgantvā marammaraṭṭhaṃ dūsesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:662_1: Sāsanaṃ abbhappaṭicchanno viya cando dubbalaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:663_0: Kaliyuge tevīsādhike vassasahasse sampatte tassa rañño kaniṭṭho mahāpavaradhammarājālokādhipati nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:663_1: Tasmiñca kāle lokasaṅketavasena puññaṃ mandaṃ bhavissatīti vedasatthaññūhi ārocitattā lokasaṅketavaseneva
anya-e0702n0:663_2: abhinavapuññuppādanatthaṃ khandhavāragehaṃ kārāpetvā tāvakālikavasena saṅkamitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:663_3: Tato aparabhāge uttaragehaṃ bhinditvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne vihāraṃ kārāpetvā ekassa mahātherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:664_0: Dakkhiṇagehaṃ pana nagarassa puratthimadisābhāge vihāraṃ kārāpetvā aggaṇammālaṅkārattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:664_1: So ca thero kaccāyanaganthassaceva abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa ca mātikādhātukathāyamakapaṭṭhānānañca atthaṃ marammabhāsāya yojesi.
anya-e0702n0:665_0: Uparājā ca mahāsetuno pamukhe ṭhāne sovaṇṇamayavihāraṃ kārāpetvā uttaragehavihāra vāsittherassa antevāsikassa jinārāmattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:665_1: Tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nānāratanavicitraṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tasseva therassa antevāsikassa guṇagandhattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:666_0: So pana thero ‘china vḍina’ gāme vijāto.
anya-e0702n0:666_1: Vaye pana sampatte ratanapūranagaraṃ gantvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā tato puna nivattitvā badunanagare badaragāme
anya-e0702n0:666_2: nisīditvā pacchā ‘china vḍina’ gāme catūhi paccayehi kilamatho hutvā vasati.
anya-e0702n0:666_3: Tasmiñca kāle gāme mokkhassa nāma purisassa santike ekaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiṃ rājā labhitvā ativa mamāyi.
anya-e0702n0:667_2: atha kho ekopi thero guṇagandho nāma pariyattikovido anagghoyevāti.
anya-e0702n0:668_0: Atha taṃ sutvā rājā taṃ pakkosetvā catūhi paccayehi upatthambhetvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:669_0: Sahassorodhagāme guṇasāro nāma thero paliṇagāme sujāto nāma thero ca guṇagandhattherassa sissāyeva ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:670_0: Ekasmiñca kāle tiriyapabbatavihāravāsīmahāthero bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe aggadhammālaṅkārattheraṃ kīḷanavasena evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:670_1: amhesu āvuso antaradhārayamānesu tvaṃ loke eko ganthakovidatthero bhavissasi maññeti.
anya-e0702n0:670_3: tumhesu bhante antaradhārayamānesu mayaṃ ganthakovidāna bhaveyyāmako nāma puggalo loke ganthakovido bhavissatīti.
anya-e0702n0:670_4: Porāṇapotthakesu pana ariyālaṅkāratthero nanu panidāni mayaṃ ganthakovidā na tāva bhavāmāti evamāhāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:671_0: Ekasmiñca kāle hīnāyāvattako eko mahāamacco rañño santikā attanā upaladdhaparibhogaṃ sabbaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ
anya-e0702n0:671_2: Sallāpaṃ pana katvā sabbaṃ paribhogaṃ therassa dassetvā sace bhante tvaṃ gihi bhaveyyāsi,
anya-e0702n0:671_5: tumhākaṃ pana ettako paribhogo amhākaṃ samaṇānaṃ vaccakuṭiṃ asubhabhāvanaṃ bhāvetvā pavisantānaṃ puññaṃ kalaṃ nāgghati soḷasinti.
anya-e0702n0:671_6: Kiñcāpi idañca pana vacanaṃ sāsanavaṃse appadhānaṃ hoti,
anya-e0702n0:671_7: pubbācariyasīhehi pana vutta vacanaṃ yāva apāṇakoṭikā saritabbamevāti manasikarontena vuttanti.
anya-e0702n0:672_0: Kaliyuge pana catuttiṃsādhike vassasahasse sampatte tassa putto narāvaro nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:672_2: Tassa rañño kāle ‘sī khoṃ’ cetiyassa samīpe jetavanavihāre ganthaṃ uggaṇhanto eko daharabhikkhu ganthachekopi
anya-e0702n0:672_3: samāno bālakāle bālacittena ākulito hutvā vaccakūpe vātātapehi bahisukkhabhāvena paṭicchādite daṇḍena
anya-e0702n0:672_4: ālulitvā duggandhoviya cittasantāne pariyattivātātapehi bahisukkhabhāvena paṭicchādite kenacideva rūpārammaṇādinā
anya-e0702n0:672_5: ālulitvā kilesasattisaṅkhāto duggandho vāyitvā hīnāyāvattissāmīti cintetvā gihivatthāni gahetvā saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:672_7: Antarāmagge tāva bhikkhubhāveneva cetiyaṃ vandissāmīti gihivatthāni sahāyakānaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā cetiyappamukhe leṇaṃ pavisitvā vanditvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:672_8: Atha ekā daharitthī cetiyaṅaṇaṃ āgantvā bahi leṇaṃ nisīdisvā udakaṃ siñcitvā patthanaṃ akāsi,-
anya-e0702n0:672_10: bhave bhave ca hīnāyāvattakassa purisassa pādacārikā na bhaveyyāmīti.
anya-e0702n0:673_0: Atha taṃ sutvā daharabhikkhu evaṃ cintesi,-
anya-e0702n0:673_2: ayampi daharitthī hīnāyāvattakassa purisassa pādacārikā na bhaveyyā mīti patthanaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0702n0:673_4: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bahi leṇaṃ nikkhamitvā taṃ daharitthiṃkāraṇaṃ pucchi,-
anya-e0702n0:673_5: kasmā pana tvaṃ hīnāyāvattakassa purisassa pādacārikā na bhaveyyāmīti patthanaṃ karosīti.
anya-e0702n0:673_6: Hīnāyāvattakassa bhante purisassa pādacārikā na bhaveyyāmīti vuttavacanaṃ bālapurisassa pādacārikā na bhaveyyāmīti vuttavacanena nānā na hoti,
anya-e0702n0:673_7: sadisatthakamevāti nanu hīnāyā vattako bāloyeva nāma,
anya-e0702n0:673_8: sace pana bhante hīnāyāvattako bālo nāma na bhaveyya,
anya-e0702n0:673_10: bhikkhu nāma hi parehi dinnaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanaṃ paribhuñjitvā sukhaṃ vasati,
anya-e0702n0:673_13: evaṃ pana ahutvā alasikoyeva bhuñjitvā sayitvā nisīdituṃ iccheyya,
anya-e0702n0:673_14: evampi yathākāmaṃ bhuñjituṃ sayituṃ okāsaṃ labhati,
anya-e0702n0:673_16: dārassa kiṃkaro bhavissāmīti akathentopi kathentoviya hutvā hīnāyāvatteyya,
anya-e0702n0:673_17: so loke aññehi bālehi adhiko bāloti ahaṃ maññāmi,
anya-e0702n0:673_19: ahaṃ bālatarī bhaveyyanti vutte so daharabhikkhu saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā bahinagaradvāraṃ nikkhamitvā vānaragaṇena
anya-e0702n0:674_0: Atha sahāyakā āgantvā gihivatthāni gaṇhāhīti pakkosiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:674_1: Tasmiṃ kāle so daharabhikkhu āgacchatha bhavantoti vatvā sabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ tesaṃ ācikkhitvā idāni pana bhavanto
anya-e0702n0:674_2: hīnāyāvattehīti sace yo koci āgantvā mama sīsaṃ muggarena pahāreyya,
anya-e0702n0:674_4: ito paṭṭhāya yāva jīvitapariyantā hīnāyāvattituṃ manasāpi na cintayissāmīti vatvā erāvatīnaṃdiṃ taritvā jeyyapuraṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0702n0:675_0: Jeyyapuraṃ pana patvā pariyattikovidānaṃ mahātherānaṃ santike nayaṃ gahetvā puññacetiyassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge ekasmiṃ vihāre nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:675_1: Pariyattiṃ vācetvā atha kamena taṃtaṃdisāhi bhikkhusāmaṇerā āgantvā tassa santike pariyattiṃ uggaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:675_2: Āvāsaṃ pana alabhitvā keci bhikkhusāmaṇerā chattānipi chāditvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:676_0: Ekasmiṃ kāle rājā nikkhamitvā puññacetiyaṃ vandissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0702n0:676_1: Atha chattāni chādetvā nisinne bhikkhū disvā guhāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tassa bhikkhussa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:676_3: Sukhavohāratthaṃ pana kakāralopaṃ katvā tilogarūti vohariṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:677_0: Tassa pana saddhivihāriko sattavassiko tejodīpo nāma bhikkhu parittaṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:677_2: Evaṃ tejedīpo nāma bhikkhu narāvararañño kāle parittaṭīkaṃ akāsīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:678_0: Ekasmiṃ pana kāle tiriyapabbatavihāravāsīmahāthero pādacetiyaṃ vandanatthāya gantvā paccāgatakāle kukhananagare
anya-e0702n0:678_1: suvaṇṇaguhāyaṃ jambudhajattherassa santikaṃ pavisitvā tena saddhiṃ sallāpaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:678_2: Te ca mahātherā aññamaññaṃ passitvā sallapitvā ativiya pamodiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:678_3: Lokasmiñhi bālo bālena paṇḍito paṇḍitena saddhiṃ ativiya pamodatīti.
anya-e0702n0:678_5: Tiriyapabbatavihāra vāsīmahāthero tena saddhiṃ sallāpaṃ katvā paccāgacchi.
anya-e0702n0:678_8: ahaṃ bhante rājavallabho homi rājaguru,tvaṃyeva mama purato gacchāhīti.
anya-e0702n0:678_13: Ettha ca dvepi mahātherā aññamaññaṃ gāravavasena lokavattaṃ apekkhitvā evamāhaṃsūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:678_14: Tiriyapabbatavihāravāsīmahātheropi ratanapūranagaraṃ patvā rājavaṃsapabbataṃ gantvā araññavāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e0702n0:679_0: Atha ukkaṃsikarājā kaniṭṭhena sūrakittināmena saddhiṃ mantesi,-
anya-e0702n0:679_1: sace tvaṃ vane theraṃ paṭhamaṃ passasi,
anya-e0702n0:680_0: Atha kaniṭṭhā paṭhamaṃ passitvā tiriyapabbatakandare jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kārāpetvā adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:680_1: Idañca vacanaṃ sādhujjanānaṃ guṇaṃ evakāraṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajji,
anya-e0702n0:680_2: tena puññakammena tena pītisomanassena sattakkhattuṃ devarajjasampattiṃ sattakkhattuṃ manussarajjasampattiṃ
anya-e0702n0:680_3: paṭilabhīti vuttattā sādhujjanānaṃ guṇaṃ anussaritvā puññavisesalābhatthāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:681_0: Tiriyapabbatavihāravāsīmahāthero ca jambudhajattherassa guṇaṃ ukkaṃsikarañño ārocesi.
anya-e0702n0:681_1: Rājā ca ativiya pasīditvā jambudhajoti mūlanāme dīpasaddena yojetvā jambudīpadhajoti nāmalañchaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:683_0: Jambudhajatthero pana vinayapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca attha yojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:684_0: Mūlāvāsagāme ca pubbārāmavihāravāsitthero gūḷattha dīpaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ visuddhimaggagaṇṭhipadatthañca mūlabhāsāya akāsi,
anya-e0702n0:684_2: So pana thero pubbe gāmavāsī hutvā sīsaveṭhanatālapattāni gahetvā ācariyappaveṇīvasena vinayavilomācāraṃ cari.
anya-e0702n0:684_3: Pacchā pana taṃ ācāraṃ vissajjitvā araññavāsaṃ vasi.
anya-e0702n0:684_4: Sopi thero gambhīrañāṇiko saddatthanayesu ativiya cheko.
anya-e0702n0:685_0: Kaliyuge pana pañcatiṃsādhike vassasahasse sampatte kaniṭṭho siripavaramahādhammarājā nāma bhūpālo rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:685_1: Dabbimukhajātassare pana gehaṃ kārāpetvā nisīdanato dabbimukhajātassaroti nāmaṃ pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:685_2: Tasmiṃ pana jātassare jeyyabhūmikittiṃ nāma vihāraṃ kārāpetvā sirisaddhammapālattherassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:685_3: Bahūnampi gāmavāsī araññavāsī bhikkhūnaṃ anuggahaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:685_4: Ratanapūranagarasmiñhi dasasu ‘ñyौṃ yāṃ’ rājāṃsesu ppacchimā pañca rājāno avicinitvāyeva alajjīlajjīmissakavasena sāsanaṃ paggaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:685_5: Tadā jinasāsanaṃ abbhantare candoviya atiparisuddhaṃ na ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:685_6: Evampi lajjino attano attano vaṃsānurakkhaṇavasena dhammaṃ pūretuṃ anivāritattā lajjīgaṇavaṃso na chijjati.
anya-e0702n0:685_7: Tathā alajjinopi attano attano ācariyappaveṇīvasena vicariṃsu,
anya-e0702n0:685_9: Tassa rañño kāle devacakkobhāso nāma eko thero atthi,
anya-e0702n0:686_0: Kaliyuge pana aṭṭhatiṃsādhike vassasahasse sampatte vesākhamāsassa kāḷapakkhaaṭṭhamito paṭṭhāya lokasaṅketavasena
anya-e0702n0:686_1: uppajjamānaṃ bhayaṃ nivāretuṃ navaguhāyaṃ tena devacakkobhāsattherena kathitaniyāmena paṭhamaṃ marammikabhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:686_3: Tato pacchā jeṭṭhamāsassa juṇhapakkhapāṭipadadivasato rāmaññaraṭṭhavāsike bhikkhū paṭṭhānappakaraṇaṃ vācāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:686_6: Tassa kira rañño kāle potthakaṃ aṭṭhibhallikarukkhaniyyāsehi parimaṭṭhaṃ katvā manosilāya likhitvā suvaṇṇena limpetvā piṭakaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:686_7: Tato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā idaṃ potthakakammaṃ marammaraṭṭhe akaṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:687_0: Kaliyuge saṭṭhādhike vassasahasse sampatte (assayujamāsassa kāḷapakkhachaṭṭhamiyaṃ aṅgāravāre) tassa putto rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:687_4: Tassa pana rañño kāle sallāvatiyā nāma nadiyā pacchimabhāge tunnanāmake gāme guṇābhilaṅkāro nāma thero
anya-e0702n0:687_5: sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmaggavesanakāle ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ kārāpetvā sīsaveṭhanatālapattāni pana na gaṇhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:687_7: Eko gaṇo hutvā saparivārena saddhiṃ tunnagāme nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:687_9: So pana thero pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu adhippāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ na jānāti,
anya-e0702n0:688_0: Tasmiñca kāle ketumatīnagare nisinnā baddhannā buddhaṅkuratthera cittattherā,
anya-e0702n0:688_2: taluppanagare jeyyabahuandhagāme kalyāṇattheroti ime cattāro therā sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmappavesanakāle ekaṃsaṃ
anya-e0702n0:688_3: uttarāsaṅgaṃ akārāpetvā sīsaveṭhanatālapattāni aggaṇhāpetvā cīvaraṃ pārupāpetvā tālavaṇṭaṃ gaṇhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:688_5: Te pana therā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu adhippāyaṃ yathābhūbhaṃ jāniṃsu,
anya-e0702n0:688_7: Iccevaṃ sirimahāsīhasūrasudhammarañño kāle pārupanabhikkhūhi nānā hutvā virūpaṃ āpajjitvā ekaṃsikagaṇo nāma visuṃ bhijji,
anya-e0702n0:688_8: yathā pana ayamalaṃ ayato uṭṭhahitvā visadisaṃ hutvā viruddhaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0702n0:688_9: Evaṃ bhijjamānāpi gaṇā rājā pamādo anussukko hutvā attano attano rucivaseneva caritvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:689_0: Tesu ca dvīsu gaṇesu pārupanagaṇe therā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu nītatthavasena vuttaṃ vacanaṃ nissāya nikkaṅkhā niddosāva hutvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:689_1: Ekaṃsikagaṇe pana therā attano attano vādo na pāḷiyaṃ na ca aṭṭhakathāsu neva ṭīkāsu nāpi ganthanteresu dissati,
anya-e0702n0:689_2: imamatthaṃ ajānantā idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti vatvā keci pana sakasakasissānaṃ ovādaṃ adaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:690_0: Keci pana pāḷiyādīsu sakavādassa anāgatabhāvaṃ ñatvāyeva aparisuddhacittā hutvā sammāsambuddhassa bhagavato
anya-e0702n0:690_1: mukhaṃ anoloketvā sammāsambuddhasseva bhagavato guṇaṃ anussaritvā sakavāde ākāse pasārita hatthoviya
anya-e0702n0:690_2: appatiṭṭhānoti jānitvāyeva amhākaṃ vādo sampattalaṅkassa saddhammacārittherassa vaṃsappabhavoti anissāyabhūbhampi
anya-e0702n0:690_5: Phyasīnāmake gāme diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyi katthaṃ anapekkhantassa hīnāyāvattakassa dussīlassa upāsakassa
anya-e0702n0:690_6: lañjaṃ datvā amhākaṃ vādānurūpaṃ ekaṃ ganthaṃ karohīti uyyojetvā anāgate anubhaviyamānadukkhato abhāyitvā
anya-e0702n0:691_0: Tasmiṃñca kāle nigrodhapāḷisuvaṇṇavihāravāsitthero gāmavāsībhikkhu gaṇaṃ samitiṃ katvā tassa nāyako hutvā
anya-e0702n0:691_1: sīsaveṭhanaṃ adhārentā amaṅgalabhikkhū sāsane mātiṭṭhantūti araññavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ganthaṃ vikopetvā
anya-e0702n0:691_3: Atha hatthisālagāmassa puratthimāya anudisāya seṭṭhitaḷākassa dakkhiṇāya anudisāya vihāre nisinne atirekapaṇṇāsabhikkhūpi
anya-e0702n0:691_5: Atha rājā tamatthaṃ sutvā gāmavāsīgaṇopi eko,
anya-e0702n0:691_8: sakasakavādavasena sakasakaṭṭhāne nisīdi tabbanti rājalekhanaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:691_9: Atha araññavāsībhikkhū sukhaṃ vasituṃ okāsaṃ labhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:692_0: Kaliyuge chasattatādhike vassasahasse sampatte tassa rañño putto mahāsīhasūradhammarājādhirājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:692_1: Soyeva sūrajjarājāti ca setibhindoti ca vohāriyati.
anya-e0702n0:693_0: Tassa rañño kāle suvaṇṇayānolokanagāmavāsīukkaṃsamālaṃ nāma theraṃ antoyudhanāyako eko amacco ānetvā
anya-e0702n0:693_1: ratanapūranagaraṃ patvā suvaṇṇakukkuṭācale vihāraṃ kārāpetvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:694_2: Tassa gāmassa rājūhi dinnavasena cetiyajagganakamme yuttakulattā pana rañño ācariyaṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvā antoyudhanāya kasseva pūjanatthāya niyyādesi.
anya-e0702n0:694_3: Tassāpi rañño kāle sāmaṇerehi gāmappavasanakāle pārupetvā pavisitabbanti ekacce vadiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:694_4: Ekacce pana ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā pavisitabbanti vadiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:695_0: Tattha ukkaṃsamālānāmako thero pārupanagaṇe padhāno hutvā nānāganthesu pārupanavattameva āgatanti pakāsiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:695_1: Ekaṃsikagaṇe pana tiriyapabbatavihāravāsīmahātherā ācariyappaveṇīdassanavasena pārupanavādaṃ paṭikkhipiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:696_0: Atha rājā ca phalikakhacitavihāravāsittheraṃ meghuccanavihāravāsittheraṃ suhatthattheraṃ buddhaṅkurattherañcāti
anya-e0702n0:696_1: ime cattāro there vinayavinicchakaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā dve pakkhā attano attano vādaṃ dassentūti āha.
anya-e0702n0:697_0: Te ca cattāro therā pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu akovidā.
anya-e0702n0:697_1: Tesañhi ṭhapetvā rājavallabhamattaṃ añño koci guṇaviseso natthi rājagurubhāvatthāya,
anya-e0702n0:697_2: yathā byagghā rukkhagacchalatādippaṭicchanne duggaṭṭhāne nisinne mige khuddakattā dubbalepi gaṇhetuṃ na sakkonti,
anya-e0702n0:697_3: evameva te ekaṃsikatthere rājānaṃ nissāya ṭhite ganthesu anāgatattā dubbalepi vādavasena abhibhavituṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:697_4: Teneva parasenāya balavataṃ jānitvā nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā veraṃ sametvā nisinno paṇḍitayodhoviya vādaṃ niṭṭhaṃ appāpetvāyeva pārupanagaṇā nisīdiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:698_0: Kaliyuge pana pañcanavutādhike vassasahasse sampatte tassa putto mahārājādhipati nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:698_1: Pacchā pana kāle terasādhike sate vassasahasse ca sampatte rāmaññaraṭṭhino rājā taṃ abhibhavitvāva anītattā pattahaṃsāvatīti pākaṭaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:699_0: Tassa rañño kāle kukhananagare jālayutta gāmato ñāṇavaraṃ nāma theraṃ ānetvā ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:699_1: So pana thero pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu ativiya cheko.
anya-e0702n0:699_2: Sudhammasabhāyaṃ pariyattivācakānaṃ sotārānaṃ atthāya abhidhammatthasaṅgahappakaraṇassa gaṇṭhipadatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:699_3: Tato pacchā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ gaṇṭhipadatthaṃ surāvinicchayañca akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:699_4: Tato pacchā tena raññā yācito abhidhānappaṭīpikāya atthaṃ marammabhāsāya yojesi.
anya-e0702n0:699_5: Rañño nāmalañchaṃ chandolaṅkārasaddanettividaggadaṇḍībyañjīnanayehi alaṅkaritvā rājādhirājanāmatthappakāsiniṃ nāma ganthampi akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:700_0: Rājā hatthisālanāmake dese kārāpitagehaṃ bhinditvā satappamāṇe vihāre kārāpetvā sabbesampi vihārānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:700_1: kittijeyyavāsaṭṭhāpananti nāmāni paññāpetvā tasseva therassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:701_0: Tasmiñca kāle akyakarañño piturañño ca kāle tesaṃ dvinnaṃ gaṇānaṃ vivādavasena avippakatavacanaṃ puna
anya-e0702n0:701_1: vivādassa vūpasamanatthāya attano attano vādaṃ kathāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:701_2: Pārupanagaṇe so thero padhāno hutvā ekaṃsikagaṇe pana pāsaṃsatthero padhāno hutvā yathāyuddhaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:701_3: Atha rājā ativiya rājavallabhaṃ jeyyabhūmisuvaṇṇavihāravāsittheraṃ tesaṃ vādassa vinicchindanatthāya vinayacareṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:702_0: Kiñcāpi so pana thero pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu thokaṃyeva jānakattā pariyattikovidesu abbohārikoyeva ahosi,
anya-e0702n0:702_1: rājavallabhattā pana rājā yathābhūtaṃ ajānitvā vinayadharaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:702_3: ayaṃ pana pacchimadisābhi evamādinā disāvavatthānamattaṃyeva kātuṃ samatthaṃ naṅgalakoṭiyā saṃvaḍḍhantaṃ
anya-e0702n0:702_5: evameva rājā ayaṃ īdiso ayaṃ īdisoti ajānitvā vinayadharaṭṭhāne ṭhapitattā so jeyyabhūmisuvaṇṇavihāravāsitthero
anya-e0702n0:702_6: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ pakkhānaṃ dvīsu vādesu ayaṃ bhūto ayaṃ abhūtoti vattuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n0:702_8: Seyyathāpi nāma mahiso attano samīpe ṭhatvā devagītaṃ gāyitvā devavīṇaṃ vādentassa devagandhabbassa veḷusalākaṃ
anya-e0702n0:702_9: paharantassa ca gāmadārakassa saddesu kiñci visesaṃ na jānāti,
anya-e0702n0:702_11: Atha rājā mama vijite yeyebhikkhū yaṃyaṃicchanti,
anya-e0702n0:702_12: tetebhikkhū taṃtaṃcaritvā yathākammaṃ nisīdantūti rājalekhanaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:703_0: Aparabhāge terasādhike sate sahasse ca sampatte ratanapūranagaraṃ vinassi.
anya-e0702n0:704_0: Tato pacchā dutiye saṃvacchare ratanasikhanagaramāpako rājā rāmaññaraṭṭhindassa rañño senaṃ yavakhettato
anya-e0702n0:704_1: cātakasakuṇaṃviya attano puññanubhāvena marammaraṭṭhato nīharitvā sakalampi rāmaññaraṭṭhaṃ attano hatthagataṃ
anya-e0702n0:705_1: yathā nāma sūriyātapena milāyantānaṃ kumudānaṃ anotattodakena siñcitvā haritattaṃ pāpeti,
anya-e0702n0:705_2: evameva rāmaññaraṭṭhindassa senābalātapehi dukkhappattānaṃ marammaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ gahaṭṭhānañceva bhikkhūnañca
anya-e0702n0:705_3: attano puññānotattodakena chiñcitvā kāyikacetasikavasena duvidhampi sukhaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0702n0:706_0: Sakalamarammaraṭṭhavāsino ca ayaṃ amhākaṃ rājā bodhisattoti vohāriṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:706_1: Atha ekasmiṃ māse catūsu uposathadivasesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā antepure pavesetvā piṇḍapātena bhojesi.
anya-e0702n0:706_3: Sabbesampi rājorodhāmaccānaṃ guṇattayapāṭhaṃ saha atthayojanānayena vācaggataṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:707_0: Atha beluvagāmavāsīyasattheraṃ anetvā attano ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:707_2: Tato paṭṭhāya pana atulattheroti nāmena pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:707_4: pārupitvā pavisitabbanti akkharaṃ likhitvā rañño santikaṃ sandesapaṇṇaṃ paveseti.
anya-e0702n0:708_0: Atha ekaṃsikagaṇapakkhāpi atulattherādayo pubbesaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasami,
anya-e0702n0:708_1: idāni vūpasamitakammaṃ puna na uppādetabbanti lekhanaṃ likhitvā rañño santikaṃ pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:709_0: Atha rājā dvinnaṃ pakkhānaṃ sakasakavādaṃ kathetukāmopi idāni rājappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kammaṃ bahu atthi,
anya-e0702n0:709_3: pacchā sāsanappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kammaṃ karissāmīti rājalekhanaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:709_4: Aparabhāge pana rājā evaṃ āṇaṃ ṭhapesi,-
anya-e0702n0:709_5: idāni mama vijite sabbepi bhikkhū mama ācariyassa matiṃ anuvattitvā carantūti.
anya-e0702n0:710_0: Atha pārupanagaṇabhikkhūpi ekaṃsikagaṇaṃ anuvattesuṃ rañño āṇāvasena.
anya-e0702n0:710_1: Sahassorodhagāme pana dve mahātherā attano parisaṃ pārupanavaseneva gāmappavesanavattaṃ paripūritabbanti ovaditvā nisīdiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:711_0: Tadā rañño ācariyo yasatthero tamatthaṃ sutvāte pakkosāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:711_1: Te ca āgantvā nagaraṃ sampattakāle eko upāsako pasanno hutvā tesaṃ therānaṃ piṇḍapātena upaṭṭhahi.
anya-e0702n0:711_2: Atha atulatthero te mahāthere dūraṭṭhānato vālukaṃ ānetvā tassa upāsakassa gehasamīpe okirāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:711_3: Idaṃ vinayadhammassa ananulomavasena carantānaṃ daṇḍakammanti kolāhalampi uppādesi.
anya-e0702n0:711_4: Atha tesaṃ vālukaṃ āharantānaṃyeva aññamaññaṃ sallapesuṃ,-
anya-e0702n0:711_5: idāni bhante vinayadhammānulomavasena ācarantānaṃ amhākaṃ īdisaṃ kammaṃ asāruppaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:711_6: aho acchariyadhammo lokoti eko thero āha.
anya-e0702n0:711_8: idāni āvuso lokapālā devā īdisaṃ adhammakammaṃ disvāyeva ajjhupekkhitvā appossukā nisīdituṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n0:711_9: idāni lokapālā devā pamajjitvā nisīdanti maññeti.
anya-e0702n0:712_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe vegena megho uṭṭhahitvā atulattherassa vihāre rājagehe ca ekakkhaṇe asaniyo nipatiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:712_1: Evaṃ samānopi so thero atimānathaddhatāya satiṃ na labhi.
anya-e0702n0:713_0: Puna rājā idāni mama vijite sabbepi bhikkhū mama ācariyassa matiṃ anuvattanti vā mā vāti amacce pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:713_2: idāni mahārāja kukhananagare nīpagāme nisinno eko mahāthero munindaghoso nāma atthi,
anya-e0702n0:713_3: so pārupanavasena attano parisaṃ ovādetvā bahuguṇaṃ uppādetvā nisīdatīti.
anya-e0702n0:714_1: taṃ pakkosetvā sudhammasasāyaṃ mahāthere sannipābhāpetvā tassa therassa vinaya paṇṇattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ
anya-e0702n0:715_1: Mahātherā ca sudhammasassayaṃ sannipatitvā taṃ pakkosetvā ovadiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:715_2: Tesu pana mahātheresu eko thero bhūpālassa saṅgharañño ca mukhaṃ oloketvā bhagavato pana sammāsambuddhassa
anya-e0702n0:715_4: idāni āvuso imasmiṃ marammaraṭṭhe sabbepi bhikkhū bhūpālassa saṅghassa rañño ca āṇaṃ anuvattitvā ekaṃsikāyeva ahesuṃ,
anya-e0702n0:715_5: tvaṃyeva eko saddhiṃ parisāya pārupanavatthaṃ caritvā nisīdasi,
anya-e0702n0:715_6: kasmā pana tvaṃ mānathaddho hutvā īdisaṃ anācāraṃ avijahitvā tiṭṭhasīti.
anya-e0702n0:716_0: Atha munindaghosatthero tassa therassa mukhaṃ ujukaṃ oloketvā evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:716_1: tvaṃ lajjīpesalo sikkhākāmoti pubbe mayā sutapubbo,
anya-e0702n0:716_2: īdiso pana puggalo īdisaṃ vacanaṃ vattunaṃ yutto,īdisassa hi puggalassa īdisaṃ vacanaṃ assāruppaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:716_3: sace tvaṃ ayaṃ appapuñño nittejo anāthoti maṃ maññitvā agāravavasena vattuṃ iccheyyāsi,
anya-e0702n0:716_4: evaṃ santepi mamācariyassa mukhaṃ oloketvā mamācariyassa guṇaṃ jānitvā tassa sissoyanti anussaritvā īdisaṃ vacanaṃ adhammikaṃ vattuṃ na sakkāti.
anya-e0702n0:717_2: Atha sukhammasabhāyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ buddharūpaṃ vadditvā ayaṃ mamācariyoti āha.
anya-e0702n0:717_3: Mamāsariyoti vatvā pana bhikkhusaṅghamajjhe uṭṭhahitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā
anya-e0702n0:717_4: añjaliṃ paggahetvā ahaṃ bhante yāva jīvitapariyosānā mama jīvitaṃyeva pariccajissāmi,
anya-e0702n0:717_5: bhagavato panati lokaggassa sikkhāpadaṃ na vijahissāmīti ārocesi.
anya-e0702n0:718_0: Atha rājā tamatthaṃ sutvā mānathaddho eso mama vijite nisīdāpetuṃ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0702n0:719_0: Rājapurisā ca taṃ pakkosetvā raṭṭhantaraṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n0:719_1: Bahaṅgaṃ nāma desaṃ patvā bahaṅganāyako puriso rājapurisānaṃ lañjaṃ datvā evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:720_0: Rāja purisāpi lañjaṃ gahetvā tattheva ṭhapetvā nivattiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:720_1: Theropi catūhi disāhi āgatānaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ pārupanavasena ovādaṃ datvā pariyattiṃ vācetvā tattha nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:721_0: Aparabhāge rājā tamatthaṃ sutvā idāni so thero mama vijitapariyanteyeva nisīditvā amhehi anicchitaṃ nivāritaṃ kammaṃ katvā nisīdi,
anya-e0702n0:722_1: Thero ca idāni maṃ rājā māretukāmoti maññitvā sikkhaṃ paccakkhitvā gihivatthaṃ nivāsetvā tehi saddhiṃ āgacchi.
anya-e0702n0:722_2: Nagaraṃ pana āgantvā pattakāle rañño santikaṃ ānesi.
anya-e0702n0:723_1: tvaṃ bhikkhu hutvā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhāpetvā nisīdasīti mayā sutaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:723_3: Sace tvaṃ mahārāja maṃ māretukāmo pakkoseyyāsi,
anya-e0702n0:723_4: evaṃ sati yadi sikkhaṃ appaccakkhāya ṭhitaṃ maṃ māreyyāsi,
anya-e0702n0:723_5: tava bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ bhavissatīti manasikaritvā tava kammassa abhāriyatthāya sikkhaṃ paccakkhitvā āgatomhi,
anya-e0702n0:723_7: Rājā ca taṃ bandhanāgāre ṭhapetvā syāmaraṭṭhaṃ yujjhanatthāyagacchi.
anya-e0702n0:723_8: Yajjhanatthāya pana gantvā paccāgatakāle antarāmaggeva divaṅgato ahosīti.
anya-e0702n0:724_0: Kaliyuge pana dvāvīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa jeṭṭhaputto siripavaramahādhammarājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:724_1: Ratanasikhanagarato saṅkametvā jeyyapuraṃ dutiyaṃ māpitattā jeyyapuramāpeko rājātipi tassa samaññā ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:724_2: Tasmiñca kāle mahāpabbatabbhantaranagaravāsiṃ ñāṇattheraṃ ānetvā ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:724_3: Sokira thero gambhīrapañño ekasmiṃ divase nava vā dasa vā bhāṇavāre vācuggataṃ kātuṃ samattho ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:724_4: Abhinavopasampannakāleyeva padavibhāgaganthaṃ nyāsasaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ yamakasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ mahāpaṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanañca marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:724_5: Rājā mahābhūmirammaṇiyavihāraṃ nāma kārāpetvā tasseva adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:725_0: Tasmiñca kāle pārupanagaṇe therā evaṃ cintesuṃ,-
anya-e0702n0:725_1: idāni pana amhākaṃ pakkhiko thero rañño ācariyo ahosi,
anya-e0702n0:725_3: Evaṃ pana cintetvā sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmappavesanakāle cīvaraṃ pārupetvā pavisitabbanti sandesapaṇṇaṃ rañño santikaṃ pavesesi.
anya-e0702n0:725_4: Atha atulatthero pubbe vuttanayena vūpasamitaṃ kammamidanti sandesapaṇṇaṃ rañño santikaṃ pavesesi.
anya-e0702n0:725_5: Teneva aññamaññaṃ paṭivacanavasena dassetuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:726_0: Tato pacchā kaliyuge pañcavīsavassādhike sate sahasse ca sampatte tassa rañño siripavarasudhammamahārājindādhipati nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:726_1: Ratanapūraṃ pana tatiyaṃ māpakattā ratanapūramāpakoti ekassa pana chaddantanāgarājassa sāmibhūtattā setibhindoti ca samaññā ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:726_2: Caracca gāmavāsīcandāvaraṃ nāma theraṃ ānetvā attano ācariyaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:726_3: Sūmikittiatulaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:726_5: Tassa rañño kāle ekacce manussā diṭṭhivipallāsā ahesuṃ,
anya-e0702n0:726_7: Tassa pana rañño kāle ekaṃsikagaṇaṃ abhibhavituṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:727_0: Tato pacchā kaliyuge aṭṭhatiṃsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa rañño putto mahādhamme rājādhirājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:727_1: Nagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge pañcabhūmikavihāraṃ kārāpetvā jeyyabhūmivāsātulanāmena paññāpetvā mārāvaṭṭanassa nāma therassa adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:728_0: Tasmiñca kāle nandamālo nāma thero calaṅganagarassa puratthimadisābhāge vihāre nisīditvā bahūnaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ ganthaṃ vācesi.
anya-e0702n0:728_2: ekaṃsikavattaṃ pana neva pāḷiyaṃ na aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na ca ṭīkāsu nāpi ganthantaresu dissati,
anya-e0702n0:729_0: Atha ekaṃsikagaṇikā bhikkhū taṃ ganthaṃ rañño santikaṃ pavesiṃsu dosāvikaraṇatthāya.
anya-e0702n0:729_1: Tasmiñca kāle rājā evarūpaṃ supinaṃ passi, -
anya-e0702n0:729_2: sakko hi devarājā setavatthaṃ nivāsetvā setālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā setakusumāni pilanditvā rañño santikaṃ āgantvā evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:729_3: aparantaraṭṭhehi mahārāja nampadānadītīre pādacetiye bahūni tiṇāni uṭṭhahitvā aññamaññaṃ mūlena mūlaṃ
anya-e0702n0:729_4: khandhena khandhaṃ pattena pattaṃ sampandhitvā paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni,
anya-e0702n0:729_5: tāni pana pubbarājūhi yathābhūtaṃ ajānantehi avisodhitāni,
anya-e0702n0:729_6: idāni pana tayā yathābhūtaṃ jānantena parisuddhaṃ kattukāmena visodhitabbāni,
anya-e0702n0:729_7: tatthaca eko bhikkhu āgantvā upadesanayaṃ dassatīti.
anya-e0702n0:730_0: Evaṃ pana supinaṃ passitvā nandamālaṃ nāma theraṃ pakkosāpetvā ratanapūranagarassa esannaṭṭhāne udakakīḷanatthāya kārāpite rājagehe vasāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:731_0: Atha thero sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmappavesanakāle pārupanavasena pavisitabbanti pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantarehi rājānaṃ jānāpesi,
anya-e0702n0:731_2: Atha rājā paricita pāramīpuññasambhāro mahāñāṇo jānāsi,-
anya-e0702n0:731_4: ekaṃsikavādo pana tesu katthacipi na āgatoti.
anya-e0702n0:731_5: Evaṃ pana jānitvā rañño gehe dve pakkhe there sannipātāpetvā attano attano vādaṃ kathāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:732_2: Tadā pārupanattherā parimaṇḍalaṃ pārupissāmītiādinā nayena pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu pārupanavādo āgatoti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:732_5: Tadā te ekaṃsikattherā advāragharaṃ paviṭṭhakāloviya rattibhāge mahāvanamagge gamanakāloviya ca hutvā kiñci vattuṃ na sakkā.
anya-e0702n0:732_6: Mukhaṃ nāma kathanatthāya bhuñjanatthāya hotīti vuttattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vadantāpi rājānaṃ ārādhetuṃ na sakkhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:733_0: Rājā ca theraṃ nissāya vinaye kosallatāya pāḷiyaṃ īdisoyeva āgato,
anya-e0702n0:733_1: aṭṭhakathādīsu īdisoyevāti vatvā tumhākaṃ ekaṃsikavādo pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantaresu na dissati,
anya-e0702n0:733_2: evampi samānā kasmā īdisaṃ vattaṃ akaṃsūti pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:733_3: Atha te ekaṃsikattherā catuhatthagabbhe sahoḍḍena gahitacorāviya manussehi gatitakākāviya ca kiñci vattuṃ
anya-e0702n0:733_4: asakkuṇeyyatāya sabbadisāsu oloketvāyeva amhākaṃ cārittaṃ pāḷiādīsu na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:733_5: atha kho pana ācariyappaveṇīvaseneva carimhāti vatvā parājayaṃ patvā pārupanapakkheyeva pavisiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:733_6: Rājā ca ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhū pārupanavattameva kārāpetuṃ sāmaṇerānaṃ ovadantūti rājāṇaṃ ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:733_7: Tato paṭṭhāya ekaṃsikapakkhātherā aruṇuggamanakāle kosiyāviya sīsaṃ uṭṭhahitumpi na sakkāti.
anya-e0702n0:734_0: Sokasarabhūmahācetiyassa puratthimadisābhāge dvīhi pāsādehi alaṅkataṃ catubhūmikaṃ bhūmikittivirāmaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kārāpetvā nandamālattherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:734_3: Abhinavopasampannakāleyeva vinayavinicchayassa suttasaṅgahassa mahāvaggaṭṭhakathāya ca atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi,
anya-e0702n0:735_0: Tato pacchā kaliyuge tecattālīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte phaggunamāsassa kāḷapakkhapanna rasamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:736_1: ekaṃsikapārupanavasena uppanno vivādo pubbesaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle vūpasamituṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n0:736_2: siripavarasudhammamahārājindādhipatino kālepi rājagehe sannipātāpetvā rañño sammukhe kathāpitattā vissaṭṭhena
anya-e0702n0:736_3: kathetuṃ okāsassa aladdhattā yathākāmaṃ vattuṃ avisahattā parājayo ahosīti lesaṃ oḍḍatuṃ okāso bhaveyyamayhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:736_4: pana kāle īdisaṃ akatvā tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ vihāre dūtaṃ pesetvā sakasakavādaṃ kathā pessāmi,
anya-e0702n0:736_5: evañhi sati tetetherā vissaṭṭhā hutvā kathessantīti.
anya-e0702n0:737_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā antoyudhanāyakaṃ amaccaṃ padhānaṃ katvā tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ārocāpesi,-
anya-e0702n0:737_2: Atha ekaṃsikagaṇikā therā amhehi vuttavacanaṃ pāḷiādīsu na dissati,
anya-e0702n0:737_3: atha kho pana ācariyappaveṇīvaseneva mayaṃ carimhāti anujāniṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:738_0: Mahārājā ca evaṃ therānaṃ anujānane sati kiñci kattabbaṃ natthi,
anya-e0702n0:738_1: idāni parimaṇḍalasuppaṭicchannasikkhāpadāni avikopetvā sāmaṇerā gāmaṃ pavisantūti rājalekhanaṃ tattha tattha pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:739_0: Aparabhāge pana sahassorodhagāmato upasampadā vassena sattavassikaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ānetvā antoyudhavihāraṃ nāma kārāpetvā tassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:739_2: Atha raññā yācito rājābhisekaganthaṃ parisodhetvā marammabhāsāya atthaṃ yojesi.
anya-e0702n0:740_0: Aparabhāge bhagavā dharamānoyeva āgantvā catunnaṃ yakkhānaṃ dametvā tehi dinnaṃ maṃsodanaṃ paṭiggahetvā
anya-e0702n0:740_1: pabbatasāmantadesaṃ gantvā paribhuñjitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ oloketvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
anya-e0702n0:740_3: Anāgate kho ānanda imasmiṃ dese mahānagaraṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0702n0:740_4: cattāro ca ime yakkhā tasmiṃ nagare rājāno bhavissantīti byākāsi.
anya-e0702n0:741_0: Yathābyākataniyāmeneva kaliyuge catucattālīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhadvādasamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:741_1: aṅgāravāre uttaraphaggunīnakkhattena yoge amarapuraṃ nāma mahārājaṭṭhānīnagaraṃ māpesi.
anya-e0702n0:744_0: Kannīnagarabhojakāya rājakaññāya kārāpitaṃ vihāraramaṇīyavirāmaṃ nāma vihāraṃ guṇamunindādhipati mahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:745_0: Uparañño deviyā kārāpitaṃ maṅgalāvirāmaṃ nāma vihāraṃ tipiṭakasaddhammasāmimahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:746_0: Majjhimagehavāsideviyā kārāpitaṃ maṅgalāvāsātulaṃ nāma vihāraṃ ñāṇajambudīpaanantadhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:747_0: Ime ppana cattāro mahāthere saṅgharājaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:748_0: Uttaragehavāsideviyā kārāpitaṃ maṅgalabhūmikittiṃ nāma vihāraṃ kavindābhisaddhammadharadhajamahādhammarājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:749_0: Sirikhettanagarabhojakena rājakumārena kārāpitaṃ atulabhūmivāsaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kavindābhisaddhammapavaramahādhamma rājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:752_0: Dhammavinicchakena ekenāmaccena kārāpitaṃ vihāraṃ kavinda sāradhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:752_1: yo ‘lokā mhāṃ keṃ sayāḍo’ iti vuccati.
anya-e0702n0:753_0: Iccevaṃ pariyattikovidānaṃ anekānaṃ mahātherānaṃ saddhiṃ nāmalañchena vihāraṃ datvā anuggahaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:753_1: Yasmā pana sabbesaṃ therānaṃ nāmaṃ uddharitvā visuṃ visuṃ kathite ayaṃ sāsanavaṃsappadīpikakathā atippapañcā bhavissati,
anya-e0702n0:754_0: Pacchābhāge cattāro mahātherā rājādubbalatāya yathākāmaṃ sāsanaṃ visodhetuṃ sakkhissantīti maññitvā puna
anya-e0702n0:754_1: aṭṭha there etehi catūhi mahātherehi saddhiṃ sāsanaṃ visodhāpetuṃ saṅghanāyakaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:755_0: Atha arahāpi samāno nissayamuccakaṅgavikalo vinānissayācariyena vasituṃ na vaṭṭatīti jānitvā nissayā
anya-e0702n0:755_1: cariyappahonakānaṃ therānaṃ nissayaṅgāni nissayamuccakārahānaṃ nissayamuccakaṅgāni paripūrāpetvā nissitakānaṃ
anya-e0702n0:756_0: Tato pacchā kaliyuge paññāsādhike vassasate sahasseva sampatte ñāṇābhisāsanadhajamahādhammarājaguruttheraṃyeva ekaṃ saṅgharājaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:756_1: Tato paṭṭhāya soyeva eko saṅghanāyako hutvā sāsanaṃ visodhayi.
anya-e0702n0:757_0: Tato pacchā ekapaṇṇāsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte phaggunamāse mahāmunicetiyassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge
anya-e0702n0:757_1: dvīhi iṭṭhakamayehi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ pañcabhūmikaṃ asokārāme ratanabhūmikittiṃ nāma vihāraṃ atimahantaṃ
anya-e0702n0:757_4: Tato aññāni jeyyabhūmivihārakittimaṅgalavirāmādayo anekepii vihāre tasseva adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:758_0: So pana tesu vihāresu vārena nisīditvā pariyattiṃ vācesi.
anya-e0702n0:759_0: So pana thero upasampadāvassena pañcavassiko hutvā pubbeva saṅgharājabhāvato peṭakālaṅkāra nāma nettisaṃvaṇṇanaṃ abhinavaṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:759_2: Saṅgharājā hutvā sādhujjanavilāsiniṃ nāma dīghanikāyaṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:759_4: Mahādhammaraññā yācito jātakaṭṭhakathāya atthayojanaṃ catusāmaṇeravatthuṃ rājovādavatthuṃ tigumbhathomanaṃ
anya-e0702n0:759_5: chaddantanāgarājuppattikathaṃ rājādhirāja vilāsiniṃ nāma ganthañcāti evamādayopi akāsii.
anya-e0702n0:760_0: Kaliyuge pana dvāsaṭṭhādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte sīhaḷadīpato ampagahapatisso,
anya-e0702n0:760_5: vāturagammoti ime cha sāmaṇerā dasa dhātuyo dhammapaṇṇā kāratthāya ānetvā amarapuraṃ nāma mahārājaṭṭhānīnagaraṃ āgatā saddhiṃ ekena upāsakena.
anya-e0702n0:761_4: tato pacchā ca anekavāraṃ āgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhāpesi,
anya-e0702n0:762_0: Aparabhāge pana kaliyuge chacattālīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte piturañño ācariyapubbo atulo
anya-e0702n0:762_1: nāma thero cīvarapaṭalaṃ uparisaṅghāṭiṃ katvā urabandhanavatthaṃ bandhitabbanti cūḷagaṇṭhipade vuttattā
anya-e0702n0:762_2: sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmappavasenakāle ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā urabandhanavatthaṃ bandhitvāyeva pavisitabbanti
anya-e0702n0:762_3: daḷaṃ katvā rañño santikaṃ lekhanaṃ pavesesi.
anya-e0702n0:763_0: Atha rājā taṃ sutvā mahāthere sudhammasabhāyaṃ sannipātāpetvā atulattherena saddhiṃ sākacchaṃ kārāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:763_1: Atha atulatthero cīvarapaṭalaṃ uparisaṅghāṭiṃ katvā urabandhanavatthaṃ bandhitabbanti cūḷagaṇṭhipade
anya-e0702n0:763_2: āgatapāṭhaṃ dassetvā sāmaṇerānaṃ gāmappavesanakāle ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā urabandhanavatthaṃ bandhitvā
anya-e0702n0:764_1: īdiso adhippāyo aññattha dissati vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n0:764_3: aññattha pana īdiso adhippāyo na dissatīti.
anya-e0702n0:764_6: Sīhaḷadīpe anurādhapurassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge pokkanti gāme arahantena moggalānattherenāti.
anya-e0702n0:764_11: ayañhi gantho sīhaḷadīpato attanā ānītesu ganthesu asuko gantho asukena therena katoti viññāpanatthāya buddhaghosattherena kato,
anya-e0702n0:764_13: Sace idānāyaṃ gantho tumhākaṃ hatthe saṃvijjati,
anya-e0702n0:764_16: Atha mahātherehi saṅgharājappamukhehi tasmiṃ ganthe passite vinayagaṇṭhipadaṃ sīhaḷadīpe parakkamabāhurañño kāle moggalānatthero akāsīti āgataṃ,
anya-e0702n0:764_17: na cūḷagaṇṭhipadaṃ sīhaḷadīpe anurādhapurassadakkhiṇadisābhāge pokkantigāme arahā moggalānatthero akāsīti.
anya-e0702n0:765_1: kasmā pana piṭakattayalakkhaṇaganthe anāgatampi āgataṃviya katvā musā vadatha,
anya-e0702n0:765_2: na nu tumhākampi ekaṃsikabhikkhūnaṃ musāvādasikkhāpadaṃ atthīti.
anya-e0702n0:765_3: Atha atulatthero uttariṃ vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā luddakassa vākure bandhamigoviya phandamāno hutvā aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0702n0:765_4: sahoḍḍena gahitoviya coro sahamusāvādakammena so thero gahito ahosīti.
anya-e0702n0:767_0: Imasmiṃ kira raṭṭhe eko janapadavāsīpuriso kenacideva karaṇīyena amarapuraṃ nāma mahārājaṭṭhānīnagaraṃ āgacchi.
anya-e0702n0:767_1: Āgantvā ca paccāgatakāle antarāmagge pātheyyaṃ khayaṃ ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:767_4: imasmiṃ kira raṭṭhe sahassorodhagāme laddhavaro nāma mahāseṭṭhi sabbattha bhūtale ativiya pākaṭo.
anya-e0702n0:767_6: evaṃ sati tena mahāseṭṭhinā mittasanthavaṃ kātuṃ tetegāmikā manussā mama bahu lābhaṃ dassanti,
anya-e0702n0:767_8: Evaṃ pana cintetvā antarāmagge sampattasampattagāmesu mahābhogānaṃ gehaṃ vicinetvā mahābhogānaṃ santikaṃ pavisitvā kathāsallāpaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:768_5: sahassorodhagāme laddhavarassa nāma mahāseṭṭhino jāmātā dhanavaḍḍhako nāmāhanti āha.
anya-e0702n0:769_0: Atha tetegāmikā laddhavarena mahāseṭṭhinā mittasanthavaṃ kātuṃ nānābhojanehi bhojesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:769_2: Imināva nayena sampatta sampattagāmesu vañcetvā attano guṇaṃ kathetvā addhāna maggaṃ tari.
anya-e0702n0:769_6: Sahassorodhagāmaṃ sampatteyeva ayaṃ kiṃ nāma gāmoti apucchitvāyeva tasmiṃ gāme mahābhogatarassa mahāgehaṃ
anya-e0702n0:769_7: vicinanto tasseva laddhavarassa seṭṭhino mahantaṃ gehaṃ passitvā laddhavarassa seṭṭhino santikaṃ pavisitvā
anya-e0702n0:771_0: Atha mahāseṭṭhi tassa mukhaṃ ujuṃ oloketvā ayaṃ māṇava sahassorodhagāmoyeva,
anya-e0702n0:771_6: kena kāraṇena kuto āgantvā mama jāmātā bhavasīti pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:772_0: Atha so mmanussehi anubandhiyamānoviya migo sakalampi kāyaṃ phandāpetvā kiñci vattabbaṃ vacanaṃ ajānitvā aladdhappatiṭṭhānatāya evaṃ sati kuto āgato,
anya-e0702n0:772_3: ko vā ahanti idāni na jānāmi,
anya-e0702n0:772_6: ito paṭṭhāya yāva jīvitapariyosānā na vañcessāmi,
anya-e0702n0:772_9: mā kiñci daṇḍakammaṃ karohīti vatvā vegena uṭṭhahitvā palāyīti.
anya-e0702n0:773_0: Iccevaṃ atulatthero dummukho hutvā yaṃvātaṃvā mukhārūḷaṃ vilapitvā saṅghamajjhe nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:775_0: Tato pacchā khalitvā kaddame patitaṃ purisaṃ puna upari akkamantāviya puna mahātherā evaṃ pucchiṃsu,-
anya-e0702n0:775_1: idaṃ bhante tava cūḷagaṇṭhipadaṃ nāma tīsu vinayamahāṭīkāsu sādhakavasena dassitaṃ cūḷagaṇṭhipadaṃ udāhu aparanti.
anya-e0702n0:775_2: Tīsu vinayamahāṭīkāsu sādhakavasena dassitaṃ cūḷagaṇṭhipadaṃyeva idanti.
anya-e0702n0:775_3: Evaṃsati kasmā tava cūḷagaṇṭhipadeyeva vuttañhi vajirabuddhiṭīkāyaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:775_5: tathā hi vuttaṃ vimati vinodanīṭīkāyanti tāsaṃ vinayamahāṭīkānaṃ pacchā hutvā tisso vinayamahāṭīkāyo sādhakavasena dassitāti.
anya-e0702n0:775_6: Evaṃ pana pucchanto so mayā pubbe vuttaṃ tīsu vinayamahāṭīkāsu sādhakavasena dassitaṃ cūḷagaṇṭhipadaṃyeva
anya-e0702n0:775_7: idanti vacanaṃ saccamevāti mukhāsuññatthāya punappunaṃ vadi.
anya-e0702n0:777_0: Eko kira puriso ekena sahāyena saddhiṃ puttadāraposanatthāya rañño bhatiṃ gahetvā yuddhakammaṃ kātuṃ saṅgāmaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0702n0:777_1: Atha parasenāya yujjhitvā parasenā abhibhavitvā sabbe manussā attano attano abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ palāyiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:777_2: Atha sopi puriso tena sahāyena saddhiṃ attano abhimukhaṭṭhānaṃ palāyi.
anya-e0702n0:777_3: Tokaṃ palāyitvā antarāmagge parasenāhi paharitadaṇḍena mucchito hutvā so puriso tena saddhiṃ gantuṃ na sakkā,
anya-e0702n0:778_1: idāni ayaṃ ativiya bāḷagilāno hoti maraṇāsanno,
anya-e0702n0:778_4: Evaṃ pana cintetvā gilānassa santakāni kahāpaṇavatthādīni gahetvā taṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā gacchati.
anya-e0702n0:778_6: sace taṃ antarāmagge ṭhapetvā āgacchāmīti vadeyyaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:778_7: tassa ñātakā mama upari dosaṃ ropessanti,
anya-e0702n0:778_8: idāni so maritvā ahaṃ ekakova āgacchāmīti vadissāmīti.
anya-e0702n0:778_9: Sakaṭṭhānaṃ pana patvā tassa bhariyā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā mayhaṃ pana sāmiko kuhiṃ gato,
anya-e0702n0:778_10: kattha ṭhapetvā tvaṃ ekakova āgacchasīti pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:778_11: Tava ayye sāmiko paresaṃ āvudhena paharitvā kālaṅkato,
anya-e0702n0:778_12: imāni tava sāmikassa santakānīti vatvā kahāpaṇavatthādīni datvā mā soci mā paridevi,
anya-e0702n0:778_13: idāni matakabhattaṃ datvā puññabhāgaṃyeva bhājehīti samassāsesi.
anya-e0702n0:778_14: Atha sā tāni gahetvā roditvā matakabhattaṃ datvā puññabhāgaṃ bhājesi.
anya-e0702n0:779_0: Aparabhāge pana thokaṃ kālaṃ atikkante gilānā vuṭṭhito sakagehaṃ āgacchati.
anya-e0702n0:779_3: gilānaṃyeva maṃ ṭhapetvā so mama santakāni gahetvā gato,
anya-e0702n0:780_0: Atha sā taṃ pakkosetvā bahi gabbhe nisīditvā pucchi,-
anya-e0702n0:780_1: mama sāmi sāmiko kālaṅkatoti taṃ saccaṃ vā alikaṃ vāti.
anya-e0702n0:781_0: Atha so puriso bahi gabbhaṃ nikkhamitvā aṅguliṃ pasāretvā na idāni bhosamma ahaṃ kiñci mattopi marāmi,
anya-e0702n0:781_1: kasmā pana amarantaṃyeva maṃ mato esoti vadesīti.
anya-e0702n0:781_2: Atha kiñci vattabbassa kāraṇassa adissanato mukhāsuññatthāya aṅguliṃ pasāretvā ujuṃ oloketvā idāni tvaṃ idha āgantuṃ samatthopi matoyeva,
anya-e0702n0:781_5: Evaṃ so punappunaṃ vadantopi jīvamānakassa saṃvijjamānattā paccakkheyeva ca tassa ṭhitattā kocipi tassa vacanaṃ na saddahi,
anya-e0702n0:782_0: Iccevaṃ atulatthero mukhāsuññatthāya vadantopi koci na saddahi, parājayaṃyeva so pattoti.
anya-e0702n0:784_0: Punapi seyyathāpi luddako kuñjaraṃ disvā ekena vārena usunā vijjhitvā patantampi kuñjaraṃ puna anuṭṭhāhanatthāya katipayavārehi usūhi vijjhati,
anya-e0702n0:784_1: evameva ekavāreneva parājayaṃ pattaṃ pana vādassa anukkhipanatthāya katipayavārehi parājayaṃ pāpetuṃ pārupanavādino mahātherā evamāhaṃsu,-
anya-e0702n0:784_2: tava cūḷagaṇṭhipadeyeva sāmaṇerānaṃ parimaṇḍalasuppaṭicchannādīni vattāni abhinditvāyeva pavisitabboti
anya-e0702n0:784_3: pubbe vatvā cīvarapaṭalauparisaṅghāṭiṃ katvā urabandhanavatthaṃ bandhitabbanti pana vuttaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:784_4: kasmā pana pubbena aparaṃ asaṃsanditvā vuttaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:784_5: tumhākaṃ vāde paṭisaraṇabhūtānaṃ pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāganthantarānaṃ natthitāya amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇabhūtaṃ cūḷagaṇṭhipadanti vadatha,
anya-e0702n0:784_6: tumhākaṃ paṭisaraṇabhūtā cūḷagaṇṭhipadatoyeva bhayaṃ uppajjatīti vatvā saha nilīyanaṭṭhānena gahitaṃ coraṃ viya saha nissayena adhammavādino gaṇhiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:786_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasito avidūre nadītīre gāmake pāṭali nāma naṭamacco vasati.
anya-e0702n0:786_1: So ekasmiṃ ussava divase bhariyamādāya bārāṇasiṃ pavisitvā naccitvā vīṇaṃ vāditvā gāyitvā dhanaṃ labhitvā
anya-e0702n0:786_2: ussavapariyosāne bahu surābhattaṃ gāhāpetvā attano gāmaṃ gacchanto nadītīraṃ patvā navodakaṃ āgacchantaṃ
anya-e0702n0:786_3: disvā bhattaṃ bhuñjanto suraṃ vivanto nisīditvā matto hutvā attano balaṃ ajānanto mahāvīṇaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā
anya-e0702n0:786_4: nadiṃ otaritvā gamissāmīti bhariyaṃ hatthe gahetvā nadiṃ otari.
anya-e0702n0:786_6: Atha naṃ sā pīṇā udake osīdāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:786_7: Bhariyā panassa osīdanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ vissajjitvā uttaritvā nadītīre aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0702n0:786_13: ekaṃ gītaṃ yācitvā parisamajjhe taṃ gāyantī jīvitaṃ kappessāmīti cintetvā sāmi tvaṃ udake nimmujjasi,
anya-e0702n0:788_0: Vuyhamānakaṃ bhaddante, ekaṃ me dehi gāthakanti.
anya-e0702n0:789_0: Atha naṃ naṭapāṭali bhadde kathaṃ tava gītaṃ dassāmi,
anya-e0702n0:789_1: idāni mahājanassa patisaraṇabhūtaṃ udakaṃ maṃ māretīti vatvā–
anya-e0702n0:790_0: Yena siñcanti dukkhitaṃ, yena siñcanti āturaṃ;
anya-e0702n0:791_0: Tassa majjhe marissāmi, jātaṃ saraṇato bhayanti.
anya-e0702n0:792_0: Atha atulatthero attano patisaraṇabhūtā cūḷagaṇṭhipadato bhayaṃ uppajjitvā kiñci vattabbaṃ ajānitvā adhomukho hutvā parājāyaṃ pattoti.
anya-e0702n0:794_0: Atha rājā tesaṃ dvinnaṃ pakkhānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā cūḷagaṇṭhipadassa pubbāparavirodhidosahi ākulattā suttasuttānulomādīsu
anya-e0702n0:794_1: appaviṭṭhattā āgamasuddhiyā ca abhāvato parovassasataṃ ciraṃ ṭhitassa gehassaviya atidubbalavasena athirataṃ
anya-e0702n0:794_2: jānitvā idāni sāsanaṃ parisuddhaṃ bhavissatīti somanassappatto hutvā mama vijite sabbepi bhikkhū pārupanavasena
anya-e0702n0:794_4: Tato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sakalepi marammaraṭṭhe pārupanavasena samānavādikā bhavantīti.
anya-e0702n0:795_1: tesañhi dvinnaṃ pakkhānaṃ sannipatitvā vacanappaṭivacana vasena vivādakathā vitthārena vuccamānā chapañcasāṇavāramattampi patvā niṭṭhaṃ na pāpuṇeyya.
anya-e0702n0:795_2: Yasmā pana sabbaṃ anavasesetvā vuccamānaṃ ayaṃ sāsanavaṃsappaṭīpikā atippapañcā bhavissati,
anya-e0702n0:796_0: Ñāṇābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirāja guru pana saṅgharājā mahāthero sīhaḷadīpe amarapuranikāyikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ādibhūto ācariyo bahūpakāro.
anya-e0702n0:797_0: Kaliyuge pana ekāsītādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa rañño nattā siritribhavanādityapavarapaṇḍitamahādhammarājādhirājā nāma rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:797_1: So pana amarapurato saṅkamitvā ratanapūraṃ catutthaṃ māpesi.
anya-e0702n0:797_2: Tassa rañño kāle guṇamunindādhipatimahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa sīssaṃ sajīvagāmavāsiṃ sīlācāraṃ
anya-e0702n0:797_3: nāma theraṃ araññavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pāmokkhaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:797_4: Rājāgāranāmake dese vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tasseva adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:798_0: Kaliyuge ekāsītādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte calaṅgapurato paññāsīhaṃ nāma theraṃ ānetvā asokārāme ratanabhūmikittivihāre patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0702n0:799_0: Kaliyuge catūsīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte munindābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirājagurūti
anya-e0702n0:799_1: nāmalañchaṃ datvā mahājeyyabhūmivihārarammaṇīyaṃ nāma vihāraṃ datvā taṃyeva mahātheraṃ saṅgharājaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:800_1: catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantesu antogadhā vā,
anya-e0702n0:800_2: udāhu cattālīsāya dantehi visuṃ bhūtāti pucchi.
anya-e0702n0:801_1: catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantesu antogadhāti.
anya-e0702n0:801_2: Ekacce pana catasso dāṭhā nāma cattālīsāya dantehi visuṃ bhūtāti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:802_3: Tesañhi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaālābubījasaṇṭhānā,
anya-e0702n0:802_4: tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno,
anya-e0702n0:803_0: Tassa kira uttaroṭṭhaappakatāya tiriyaṃ phāletvā apanītaddhaṃviya khāyati,
anya-e0702n0:803_1: cattāro dante dve ca dāṭhā na chādeti,
anya-e0702n0:804_2: Apanītaddhaṃ viyāti upari oṭṭhassa upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ apanītaṃ viya khāyatīti attho.
anya-e0702n0:804_3: Na chādetīti upari oṭṭhassa upaḍḍhabhāge pana na paṭicchādeti.
anya-e0702n0:804_4: Tenāhi yena cattāro dante dve ca dāṭhā na chādeti,
anya-e0702n0:804_6: Evaṃ antogadhavādehi therehi ganthaṃ āharitvā dassite sabbepi tasmiṃ vāde patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
anya-e0702n0:805_0: Ekasmiñca kāle rājā mantiniṃ amaccaṃ pucchi,-
anya-e0702n0:805_1: pubbarājūhi vihārassa cetiyassa vā dinnāni khettavatthuādīni pacchimarājūnaṃ kāle yathādinnaṃ tāni patiṭṭhahanti vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n0:806_2: bhāgaṃ datvā paribhuñjitabbānīti dasakoṭṭhāse katvā eko koṭṭhāso bhūmissāmikānaṃ dātabboti ca vinayapāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu
anya-e0702n0:806_3: vuttattā pubbe ekena raññā dinnāni khettavatthuādīni pacchā ekassa rañño kāle yathādinnaṃ ṭhitāni.
anya-e0702n0:806_4: Ettha hi saṅghikāya bhūmiyāti vuttattā lābhasīmāyaṃviya baliṃyeva adatvā saha bhūmiyā dinnattā paveṇīvasena saṅghikā bhūmi atthīti viññāyati.
anya-e0702n0:806_5: Etthaca paṭiggāhakesu matesu tadañño catuddisasaṅgho anāgatasaṅgho ca issaro,
anya-e0702n0:807_0: Cetiya padīpatthāya paṭisaṅkhāraṇatthāya vā diinnaārāmopi jaggitabbo,
anya-e0702n0:807_1: vettanaṃ atvāpi jaggāpetabboti cetiye chattaṃ vā vedikaṃ vā jiṇṇaṃ vā paṭisaṅkharontena sudhākammādīni
anya-e0702n0:807_2: vā karontena cetiyassa upanikkhepato kāretabbanti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pubbarājūhi cetiyassa dinnāni
anya-e0702n0:807_3: khettavatthuādīni pacchimarājūnaṃ kālepi cetiyasantakasāveneva ṭhitānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0702n0:808_1: kadā kassa rañño kāle ādiṃ katvā khettavatthuādīni vihārassa cetyassa vā dinnānīti.
anya-e0702n0:809_1: purimakappesu purimānaṃ rājūnaṃ kālepi vihārassa cetiyassa vā dinnānīti veditabbāni,
anya-e0702n0:809_2: teneva sujātassa nāma bhagavato amhākaṃ bodhisatto cakkavattirājā saddhiṃ sattahi ratanehi dvisahasse khuddakadīpe cattāro mahādīpe ca adāsi,
anya-e0702n0:809_3: raṭṭhavāsino ca ārāmagopakakiccaṃ kārāpesīti ganthesu āgataṃ,
anya-e0702n0:809_4: tasmā cirakālatoyeva paṭṭhāya pubbarājūhi khettavatthuādini dinnānīti veditabbāni.
anya-e0702n0:810_0: Rājavaṃsesupi bhagavato parinibbānato vassasatānaṃ upari sirikhettanagare ekāya āpūpikāya pañcakarīsa mattaṃ khettaṃ ekassa therassa dinnaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:810_1: taṃ dvattapoṅko nāma rājā vilumpitvā gaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:810_2: Atha pahāraghaṇṭabheriyo paharitāpi saddaṃ na akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:810_5: Atha taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā āpūpikāya yathādinnameva therassa niyyādesīti.
anya-e0702n0:811_0: Kaliyuge pana navanavutādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte tassa kaniṭṭho siripavarādityalokāpeti vijayamahādhammarājādhirānā rajjaṃ kāresi,
anya-e0702n0:811_1: so pana rājā ratanapūrato saṅkamitvā amarapuraṃ dutiyaṃ māpesi.
anya-e0702n0:811_2: Tassa rañño rajjaṃ pattasaṃvacchareyeva jeṭṭhamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ ratanapūranagare māravijayaratanasudhammāya
anya-e0702n0:811_3: nāma piṭakasālāya sūriyavaṃsassa nāma therassa parisamajjhe rājalekhanaṃ vācāpetvā saṅgharajjaṃ niyyādesi.
anya-e0702n0:812_0: So pana thero kaliyuge pañcavīsādhike vassasate sahasse ca sampatte migasiramāsassa juṇhapakkhasattamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:812_1: suttavāre vālukavāpigāme paṭisandhiyā vijātotisattativayaṃ sampatte saṅgharajjaṃ patto santindriyo khantī
anya-e0702n0:812_3: So pana kaliyuge pannarasādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte tassa rañño kāleyeva maccuvasaṃ patto.
anya-e0702n0:813_0: Atha rājā anekasahassehi pāsādehi abhūtapubbehi acchariyakammehi sarīrajhāpanakiccaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:813_1: Atha kaliyuge seḷasādhike vassasate sahasseca sampatte tassa mahātherassa sissaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ nāma theraṃ puna saṅgharājaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
anya-e0702n0:814_0: So pana thero kaliyuge ekasaṭṭhādhike vassasate sahasseca devasūragāme paṭisandhiyā vijāto hutvā asītādhike
anya-e0702n0:814_1: vassasate sahasseca paṭhamaāsāḷimāsassa juṇhapakkhacuddasamiyaṃ upasampadabhūmiṃ patto.
anya-e0702n0:815_0: Tassa rañño kāle kaliyuge navanavutādhike vassasate sahasseca sampatte sīhaḷadīpato paññātisso nāma thero
anya-e0702n0:815_1: saddhiṃ sunandena nāma bhikkhunā indasārena nāma sāmaṇerena ekena upāsakena ekena dārakenaca amarapuraṃ
anya-e0702n0:815_3: Atha saṅgharājā tesaṃ paccayānuggahena dhammānuggaheca anuggahesi.
anya-e0702n0:815_4: Tesu aparabhāge kaliyuge dvivassādhike dvisate vassasahasseca sampatte paññātissatthero jararogena abhibhūtattā
anya-e0702n0:815_6: Tassa puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmīti parivitakko matthakaṃ appatto hutvā vinassayi.
anya-e0702n0:817_0: Na hi cintāmayā bhogā, itthiyā purisassa vāti.
anya-e0702n0:818_0: Imasmiṃ pana loke paṇḍito puññaṃ kattukāmo abhitthareva kareyya.
anya-e0702n0:818_1: Ko nāma jaññā ajje vā suve vā parasuve vā maraṇaṃ bhavissabhīti.
anya-e0702n0:820_0: Dandañhi karato puññaṃ, pāpasmiṃ ramatī manoti.
anya-e0702n0:821_0: Atha mahārājā tassa sarīrajhāpanakiccaṃ bahūhi sādhukīḷanasabhāyehi akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:821_1: Tato pacchā sunandassa nāma bhikkhussa puna sikkhaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:822_0: Te pana mahārājā kaliyuge tivassādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte māghamāse bahūhi paccayehi upatthambhetvā
anya-e0702n0:822_1: tānitāni sabbāni kammāni tīretvā kusimanagarajeṭṭhassa ekassa amaccassa bhāraṃ katvā tasseva sabbāni
anya-e0702n0:823_0: Saṅgharājāmahāthero pana sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthāya sotārānaṃ sukhappaṭibodhanatthāya nānāganthehi pāṭhaṃ
anya-e0702n0:823_1: visodhetvā saddhammappajjotikāya nāma mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāya atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:823_2: Bahūnaṃ sissānaṃ pariyattivācanavasena jinasāsanassa anuggahaṃ akāsīti.
anya-e0702n0:824_0: Aparabhāge kaliyuge aṭṭhavassādhike dvisake sahasseca sampatte migasiramāsassa juṇhapakkhaaṭṭhamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:825_1: Aṅguttaranikāyapāḷiyā tadaṭṭhakathāyaca attha yojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:826_1: gurutthero saddhammavilāsiniyā nāma paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāya atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:829_1: pañcavassiko paññāsāmi nāmāhaṃ saddatthabhedacintānāmakassaganthassa gaṇṭhipadatthavaṇṇanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:829_2: Dasavassikakāle pana abhidhānappadīpikāsaṃvaṇṇanāya atthayojanaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:829_3: Tassāca pāṭhaṃ bahūhi ganthehi saṃsadditvā visodhesinti.
anya-e0702n0:830_0: Aparabhāge sakkarāje cuddasādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte ayaṃ amhākaṃ dhammiko rājā anekasatajātīsu
anya-e0702n0:830_3: Dasabalassasāsanaṃ paggaṇhitukāmassa dhammarājassa manoratho matthakaṃ patto ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:830_4: Mariyādaṃ bhinditvā dinnakatamaggaṃviya udakaṃ laddhokāsatāya saddhā mahogho avattharitvā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n0:830_5: Cattārica vassāni atikkamitvā besākhamāse pañcakakudhabhaṇḍādīhi anekehi rājabhoggabhaṇḍehi parivāretvā
anya-e0702n0:832_0: Sakkarāje hi sampattiṃ, patvā dāne rato vate.
anya-e0702n0:834_0: Saddhiṃ mahesiyā sekaṃ, patto hutvā mahātale.
anya-e0702n0:839_0: Tadā yasmā alajjino niggahitabbapuggale avīcinarake nikkhipantoviya niggahakammaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0702n0:840_0: Tadā pana jinacakkaṃ, nabhe candova pākaṭaṃ;
anya-e0702n0:842_0: Yasmāca lajjino paggahitabbapuggale bhavaggeukkhipantoviya paggahakammaṃ karoti,
anya-e0702n0:842_1: tasmā te laddhokāsā uṭṭhitasīsā nirāsaṅkā hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0702n0:845_0: Tepiṭakampi navaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ kattukāmo pariyattivissaradehi mahātherehi visodhāpetvā
anya-e0702n0:845_1: lekhakānaṃ bhatiṃ datvā kaṇṭhajamuddhajādividhānaṃ sithiladhanitādividhānañca punappunaṃ vicāretvā antamaso
anya-e0702n0:845_2: paricchedalekhamattampi avirādhetvā antepuraṃ pavisetvā suvaṇṇamayesu lohamayesuca potthakesu likhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:845_3: Ñāṇathāmasampanneca bhikkhū vicinetvā yathābalaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhāreti vācuggataṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e0702n0:845_4: Aggamahesiṃ ādiṃ katvā sakala orodhādayo bahū rājasevakā amaccādayo nāgarikeca yathābalaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:845_5: abhidhammapiṭakañca visuṃ visuṃ ekekasuttamātikāpadabhājanīcittavārādivasena vibhājetvā dhāreti vācuggataṃ kārāpeti.
anya-e0702n0:845_6: Sayañca anattalakkhaṇādikaṃ anekavidhaṃ suttaṃ devasikaṃ sajjhāyaṃ karoti.
anya-e0702n0:845_7: Jinasāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthāyasakalavijiteca araññavāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ assamassa samantato pañcadhanusatappamāṇe
anya-e0702n0:845_9: Pariyatti visāradānañca therānutherānaṃ mātāpitādayo ñātake sabbarājakiccato balikammatoca mocāpetvā yathāsukhaṃ vasāpeti.
anya-e0702n0:845_10: Ekāhenevāpi sahassamatte kulaputte pabbajūpasampadabhūmīsu patiṭṭhāpetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:845_14: Aññeca orodhādayo tumhe yāni kānici puññakammāni katvā vivaṭṭameva pattheta,
anya-e0702n0:845_18: Rājūnaṃ pana raṭṭhasāmikānaṃ dhammatāya kiccabāhullatāya kadāci kadāci okāsaṃ na labhati kammaṭṭhānamanuyuñjituṃ,
anya-e0702n0:845_21: Loke hi amaṅgalasammatānipi manussasīsakapālaṭṭhiādīni susāsanato ānetvā dantakaṭṭhādīni vā taṃsadisāni
anya-e0702n0:845_22: kārāpetvā attano samīpe ṭhapetvā aṭṭhikādibhāvanāmayapuññaṃ vicināti.
anya-e0702n0:846_0: Tadā pana amhākaṃ ācariyavaraṃ pariyattivisāradaṃ tikkha javanagacchirādiñāṇopetaṃ vicitradhammadesanākathaṃ
anya-e0702n0:846_1: sakala marammikabhikkhūnaṃ onamitaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vuddhāpacāyiṃ rūpasobhaggapattaṃ yuttavādikaṃ ñeyyadhammābhimunivarañāṇakittisiridhajadhammasenāpati-
anya-e0702n0:846_2: mahādhammarājādhirājagurūti tatiyaṃ laddhalañchaṃ taṃ bhikkhusaṅghānaṃ sakalaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ pāmokkhabhāve
anya-e0702n0:849_0: Tadāca amhākaṃ dhammikamahārājā sakkarāje ekūnavīsatādhike sahasse dvisateca sampatte mantalākhyātācalassa
anya-e0702n0:849_1: samīpe subhūmilakkhaṇopetaṃ ekanipātatitthamiva bahujananayanavihaṅgānaṃ sabbanagarālaṅkārehi parikkhittaṃ
anya-e0702n0:849_2: manussānaṃ cakkhulolatājanakaṃ nānāratanehi sampuṇṇaṃ nānā verajjavāṇijānaṃ puṭabhedanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ ratanapuṇṇanāmakaṃ
anya-e0702n0:854_0: Seyyathāpi nāma loke ālokatthikānaṃ sattānaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādento upakaronto udayapabbatato sahassaraṃsī divākaro uṭṭhahati,
anya-e0702n0:854_1: evamevaṃ marammaraṭṭhikānaṃ lajjīpesalānaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gihīnañca pītisomanassaṃ uppādento
anya-e0702n0:854_2: upakāronto ayaṃ dhammikorājā imasmiṃ marammaraṭṭhe uppajjati.
anya-e0702n0:855_0: Imañca dhammikarājānaṃ nissāya marammaraṭṭhe sammāsambuddhassa sāsanaṃ ativiya joteti.
anya-e0702n0:856_1: Ayaṃ dhammikarājāyeva na sāsanassūpakāro dhammacārī dhammamānī,
anya-e0702n0:856_2: apica kho dhammikarājānaṃ nissitāpi sabbaraṭṭhavāsikā sāsanassūpakārāyeva dhammacārino dhammamānino rājānugatā hutvā.
anya-e0702n0:858_0: Sabbā gāvī ujuṃ yanti, nette ujuṃ gate sati.
anya-e0702n0:860_0: So cepi dhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
anya-e0702n0:861_0: Sabbaraṭṭhaṃ sukhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti dhammikoti.
anya-e0702n0:862_0: Visesato pana dutiyaṃ amarapuraṃ māpentassa mahādhammarañño aggamahesiyā ajjavamaddavasohajjādiguṇayuttāya
anya-e0702n0:862_1: dhitā amhākaṃ rañño aggamahesī sammācārinī patibbatā.
anya-e0702n0:862_2: Sabbanārīnaṃ aggabhāvaṃ pattāpi samānā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātena surāmadena appamajjitvā puññakammesu appamādavasena niccāraddhavīriyā hoti.
anya-e0702n0:862_5: Sammāsambuddhasāsane ativiya pasannā aññāpi orodhādayo mahādhammarañño ovāde ṭhatvā dhammaṃ cariṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:862_7: Uparājāpi mahādhammarājassa ekamātāpītiko mahādhammarājicchāya avirodhetvāyeva sakalaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ gihīnaṃ bhikkhūnañca atthahitamāvahati,
anya-e0702n0:862_8: seyyathāpi cakkavattirañño santike jeṭṭhaputto thāmajavasampanno atisūro uṭṭhānavīriyo.
anya-e0702n0:862_9: Aññepi amaccā anekasahassappamāṇā mahādhammaraññā laddhesu laddhesu ṭhānantaresu ṭhitā mahādhammarañño
anya-e0702n0:863_0: Evamekassa sādhujjanassa guṇaṃ mahantena ussāhena kathentopi dukkaraṃtāva niṭṭhaṃ pāpetuṃ,
anya-e0702n0:863_1: bhagavato pana tilokaggassa anekasahassapāramitānubhāvena pavattaṃ guṇaṃ ko nāma puggalo sakkhissati niṭṭhaṃ pāpetvā kathetunti.
anya-e0702n0:863_2: Evaṃ mahādhammarājassaca aggamahesiyāceva uparājādīnañca guṇe vissaṭṭhena vitthārato kathiyamāne imissā
anya-e0702n0:863_3: sāsanavaṃsappadīpikāya anekasatabhāṇavāramattampi patvā pariyanto na paññāyeyya,
anya-e0702n0:863_5: tasmā saṅkhepenevāyaṃ kathitā sādhujjanānaṃ mahāpuññamayāya pītiyā anumodanatthāya.
anya-e0702n0:863_7: asukasmiṃ kira kāle asukasmiṃ raṭṭhe asuko nāma rājā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajji,
anya-e0702n0:863_8: seyyathāpi nāma rukkho bhūmodakānaṃ nissāya vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷiṃ vepullamāpajjīti.
anya-e0702n0:864_1: saṅgharājā mahāthero raññā abhiyācito surājamaggadīpaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:864_2: Majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathāya atthaṃ sissānaṃ vācetvā yathāvācitaniyāmena atthayojanānayaṃ potthake āropāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:865_0: Medhābhivaṃsasaddhammadhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguru nāma mahāthero jātakapāḷiyā atthayojanānayaṃ marammabhāsāya akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:866_1: dhamma raññā aggamahesiyāca abhiyācito sīlakathaṃ nāma ganthaṃ upāyakathaṃ nāma ganthañca akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:866_2: Rañño ācariyabhūtena disāpāmokkhena nāma upāsakena abhiyācito soyevātaṃ akkharavisodhaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ āpattivinicchayaṃ nāma ganthañca.
anya-e0702n0:866_3: Tathā saṅgharaññā codito soye vāhaṃ nāgarājuppatikathaṃ vohāratthabhedañca vivādavinicchayañca akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:866_4: Tathā pañcajambugāmabhojakena lekhakāmaccena dvīhica ārocanalekhakāmaccehi abhiyācito so yevāhaṃ rājasevakadīpaniṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:866_5: Tathā dīghanāvānagarabhojakena mahāamaccena abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ nirayakathādīpakaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:866_6: Tathā silāleḍḍukanāmakena upāsakena abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ uposathavinicchayaṃ nāma ganthaṃ akāsiṃ.
anya-e0702n0:866_7: Tathā bahūhi sotujanehi abhiyācito soyevāhaṃ saddanītiyā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ pāḷibhāsāya akāsinti.
anya-e0702n0:867_0: Ekasmiñca samaye kaliyuge vīsādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte rañño etadahosi,-
anya-e0702n0:867_1: idāni buddhassa bhagavato sāsane kesañci bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca kuladūsanādiasāruppakammehi uppāditā cattāro paccayā bahū dissanti,
anya-e0702n0:867_3: kecipi vinā paccayaṃ vikāle tambulaṃ khādanti,
anya-e0702n0:867_8: idāni bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca buddhassa sammukhe buddhaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā ime anācāre na carissāmāti paṭiññaṃ
anya-e0702n0:867_10: evañca sati bhikkhū sāmaṇerāca mayaṃ buddhassa sammukhe evaṃ paṭiññaṃ karoma,
anya-e0702n0:867_11: paṭiññañca katvā vikāraṃ āpajjantānaṃ amhākaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve imasmiṃyeva paccakkhe kiñci bhayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:867_12: uppajjeyyāti paccakkhabhayaṃ apekkhitvā te sikkhāpadaṃ rakkhissantīti.
anya-e0702n0:867_13: Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca evaṃ paṭiññaṃ kārāpetuṃ yujjati vā mā vāti mayaṃ na jānāma,
anya-e0702n0:867_14: idāni saṅgharājādayo mahāthere sannipātāpetvā pucchissāmīti puna cintesi.
anya-e0702n0:868_0: Atha sabbepi mahāthere saṅgharājassa vihāre sannipātāpetvā imaṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchathāti amacce āṇāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:868_2: idāni bhante sāsane bhikkhūnaṃ sāmaṇerānañca avinayānulomācārāni disvā buddhassa sammukhe buddhaṃ sakkhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:868_3: katvā rājā yathā ime anācāre na carissāmāti paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā bhagavato sikkhāpadāni rakkhāpetuṃ icchati,
anya-e0702n0:868_4: tathā kārāpetuṃ yujjati vā mā vāti.
anya-e0702n0:869_1: yasmā sāsanassa parisuddhabhāvaṃ icchanto evaṃ karoti,
anya-e0702n0:870_1: idāni bhikkhū nāma saddhābalādīnaṃ thokatāya bhagavato āṇāsaṅkhātaṃ sacittakācittakāpattiiṃ āpajjitvā
anya-e0702n0:870_2: bhagavatāyeva anuññātehi desanāvuṭṭhānakammehi paṭikaritvā sīlaṃ parisuddhaṃ katvā lajjīpesalabhāvaṃ karonti,
anya-e0702n0:870_4: tasmā bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ kammaṃ sañciccana vītikkamissāmāti buddhassa sammukhe paṭiññākaraṇaṃ atibhāriyaṃ hoti,
anya-e0702n0:870_5: sacepi pubbe paṭiññaṃ katvā pacchā visaṃvādeyya,
anya-e0702n0:870_6: evaṃ sati paṭissavavisaṃvāde suddhacittassa dukkaṭaṃ paṭissavakkhaṇeeva pācitti itarassacāti vacanato
anya-e0702n0:870_7: taṃ taṃ āpattiṃ paṭissavavisaṃvādanadukkapettiyā saheva āpajjeyya,
anya-e0702n0:870_9: yathā pana rogaṃ vūpasamituṃ asappāyabhesajjaṃ paṭisevati,
anya-e0702n0:870_11: evaṃ āpattiṃ anāpajjitukāmo buddhassa sammukhe paṭiññaṃ karoti,
anya-e0702n0:870_13: kiñca bhiyyo abhayadassāvino bhikkhū anekasatabuddhassa sammukhe anekasatavārānipi paṭiññaṃ katvā sikkhāpadaṃ vītikkamituṃ visahissantiyevāti.
anya-e0702n0:871_0: Atha saṅgharājā mahāthero attano sissaṃ paññāsāmisirikavidhajamahādhammarājādhirājaguruṃ nāma maṃ uyyojesi,
anya-e0702n0:872_1: dve puggalā abhabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhūca bhikkhuniyoca ariyā puggalā,
anya-e0702n0:872_2: dve puggalā sabbā sañcicca āpattiṃ āpajjituṃ bhikkhūca bhikkhuniyoca puthujjanāti parivārapāḷiyaṃ vuttattā
anya-e0702n0:872_3: ariyapuggalānaṃviya puthujjanānaṃ vissaṭṭhena paṭiññaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti manasikaritvā puthujjanabhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:872_5: sabbehipi ariyaputhujjanehi bhikkhūhi upasampadāmāḷake āditova cattāri akaraṇīyāni ācikkhitabbānīti vuttesu
anya-e0702n0:872_6: catūsu akaraṇīyesu antamaso tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya yo bhikkhu pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā atirekapādaṃ vā adinnaṃ
anya-e0702n0:872_9: antamaso kuntakipillikaṃ upādāya yo bhikkhu sañcicca manussaviggahaṃ jīvitaṃ voropesi,
anya-e0702n0:872_10: antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāya assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyoti,
anya-e0702n0:872_11: antamaso suññāgāre abhiramāmīti yo bhikkhupāpiccho icchāpakato asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati,
anya-e0702n0:872_12: assamaṇo hoti asakyaputtiyotica upajjhācariyena ovadiyamānehi abhinavopasampannehi āma bhanteti paṭiññākathāyeva.
anya-e0702n0:872_13: Sāmaṇerehipi pabbajjakkhaṇeyeva upajjhāyassa santike pāṇātipātāveramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā paṭhamaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva.
anya-e0702n0:872_14: Tathā bhikkhūhi taṃtaṃāpattiṃ āpajjitvā desanāya paṭikaraṇakāle sādhu suṭṭhu bhante saṃvarissāmīti abhiṇhaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva.
anya-e0702n0:872_15: Sāmaṇerehipi upajjhācariyassa santike sikkhāggahaṇakālepi pāṇātipātāvera maṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmītiādinā abhiṇhaṃ paṭiññā katāyeva.
anya-e0702n0:872_16: Tāhi pana paṭiññāhi abhāyitvā itoyeva bhāyāmīti vuttavacanaṃ acchariyaṃviya hutvā khāyati.
anya-e0702n0:872_17: Imāya hi paṭiññāya tāsaṃ paṭiññānaṃ visesatā na dissatīti.
anya-e0702n0:873_1: paṭissavadukkaṭāpatti nāma sāvatthiyaṃ passenadikosalaraññā imasmiṃ vihāre vassaṃ upagacchāhīti āyācite
anya-e0702n0:873_2: sādhūti paṭijānitvā lābhabahulataṃ paṭicca antarāmagge aññasmiṃ vihāre vassaṃ upagantvā paṭissavavisaṃvādanapaccayā
anya-e0702n0:873_4: Samantapāsādikañca nāma vinayaṭṭhakathāya vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ paṭissaveca āpatti dukkaṭassāti
anya-e0702n0:873_5: ettha na kevalaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vassaṃ vasathāti etasseva paṭissave āpatti,
anya-e0702n0:873_8: ekato uddissāpessāmāti evamādināpi tassa tassa paṭissave dukkaṭaṃ,
anya-e0702n0:873_9: tañca kho paṭhamaṃ suddhacittassa pacchā visaṃvādanapaccayā,
anya-e0702n0:873_10: paṭhamampi asuddha cittassa pana paṭissave pācittiyanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:874_0: Iccevaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aññamaññaṃ dāyakehica saddhiṃ paṭijānitvā visaṃvādanapaccayā aññesaṃ atthahitabhedeyeva dukkaṭāpatti vuttā,
anya-e0702n0:874_1: na attano icchāvasena sayameva ahaṃ bhuñjissāmi sayissāmīti evamādinā vatvā yathāvuttānurūpaṃ akatvā visaṃvādaneti.
anya-e0702n0:874_2: Sace pana bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ paṭhamameva āma bhantetiādinā paṭiññaṃ katvā pacchā kenacideva karaṇīyena
anya-e0702n0:874_3: taṃtaṃāpattiṃ āpajjanto saha paṭissavavisaṃvādena dukkaṭāpattiyā āpajjeyya,
anya-e0702n0:874_4: evaṃ sati tattha tattha sikkhāpadesu dve dve āpattiyo paññāpeyya,
anya-e0702n0:874_6: teneva paṭissavadukkaṭāpatti nāma paresaṃ santike paresaṃ matiṃ gahetvā paṭijānitvā visaṃvādanaṭṭhāneyeva paññattāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0702n0:875_0: Idāni rājā sāsanassa suddhiṃ icchanto iminā upāyena bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ sīlaṃ saṃvarāpento paccakkhasamparāyikabhayaṃ
anya-e0702n0:875_1: anupekkhitvā saṃvaraṃ āpajjeyyunti cintetvā buddhassa sammukhe paṭiññaṃ kārāpitattā na koci doso dissati.
anya-e0702n0:875_3: Atha rājā sabbesaṃ bhikkhusāmaṇerānaṃ buddhassa sammukhe paṭiññaṃ kārāpetvā sīlaṃ rakkhāpesīti.
anya-e0702n0:876_0: Iccevaṃ imassa rañño kāle pubbe alajjinopi samānā bhayaṃ anupekkhitvā yebhuyyena lajjinova bhavantīti.
anya-e0702n0:877_0: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānato tisatādhikānaṃ dvivassasahassānaṃ upari navutime saṃvacchare bahinadītīre gāmasīmato paṭṭhāya yāva antoudakukkhepā,
anya-e0702n0:877_1: tāva kammaṃ karontānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sukhena gamanatthāya gahaṭṭhā gāmasīmāya udakukkhepasīmaṃ sambandhitvā setuṃ akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:878_0: Atha tattha ñāṇālaṅkārasumanamahādhammarājagurugaṇā cariyanāmako thero upasampadādivinayakammāni katipaya vassesu akāsi.
anya-e0702n0:879_0: Dhīrānandatthero pana tattha saṅkaradoso hotīti kammaṃ kātuṃ na icchati.
anya-e0702n0:879_1: Tathā paṭṭhāya ye ye ñāṇālaṅkārasumanamahādhammarājagurugaṇācariyassa matiṃ ruccanti,
anya-e0702n0:880_0: Atha dhīrānandapakkhe bhikkhu tappakkhikassa sīlakkhandhattherassa sisse dhammakkhandhavanaratanabhikkhū
anya-e0702n0:880_1: amhākaṃ jambudīpe ratanapuṇṇanagaraṃ pesesuṃ saṅgharājamahātherassa santike ovādassa paṭiggāhaṇatthāya.
anya-e0702n0:880_2: Te ca kaliyuge aṭṭhārasādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte kattikamāsassa juṇhapakkhaaṭṭhamiyaṃ sīhaḷadīpato
anya-e0702n0:880_3: nikkhamitvā āgacchantā ekūnavīsādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte phaggunamāsassa juṇhapakkhasattamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:881_0: Atha dhammarājā saṅgharājassa ārāme catubhūmikaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā tattha te vasāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:881_2: Saṅgharājāca tesaṃ dvinnaṃ pakkhikānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā bahūhi ganthehi saṃsanditvā vivādaṃ vinicchindi.
anya-e0702n0:881_3: Tādise ṭhāne saṅkaradosassa atthibhāvaṃ pakāsetvā sandesapaṇṇampi tesaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0702n0:882_0: Mahādhammarājāca tesaṃ puna sikkhaṃ saṅgharājassa santike gaṇhāpetvā piṭakattayapotthakādīni dātabbavatthūni
anya-e0702n0:882_1: datvā tasmiṃyeva saṃvacchare paṭhamaāsāḷimāsassa kāḷapakkhadasamiyaṃ nāvāya te pesesi.
anya-e0702n0:883_1: sisse vimalajotidhammanandabhikkhū pesesuṃ saddhiṃ ariyālaṅkārena nāma sāmaṇerena catūhica upāsakehi.
anya-e0702n0:883_2: Teca kaliyuge vīsādhike dvisate sahasseca sampatte kattikamāsassa juṇhapakkhapañcamiyaṃ sampattā.
anya-e0702n0:884_0: Tadāpi saṅgharājassa ārāmeyeva ekaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpetvā te vasāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:884_3: Dhammarājā tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ saṅgharājassa santike puna sikkhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā sāmaṇerañca upasampādetvā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ katvā pahiṇi.
anya-e0702n0:885_0: Tato pacchāca kaliyuge bāvīsādhike dvivassasate sahasseca sampatte māghamāsassa kāḷapakkhaekādasamiyaṃ
anya-e0702n0:885_1: sīhaḷadīpatoyeva dve bhikkhū tayo sāmaṇerā cattāro upāsakā sarajatasuvaṇṇakaraṇḍakaṃ sarajatasuvaṇṇacetiyadātuṃ
anya-e0702n0:885_2: hatthidantamayaṃ buddharūpaṃ mahābodhipattāni mahābodhitacaṃ mahābodhipatiṭṭhānasūmiṃ sīhaḷadakkhiṇasākhābodhipattāni
anya-e0702n0:885_3: dutiyasattāhaanimisaṭṭhānabhūmiñca dhammapaṇṇākāratthāya gahetvā ratanapuṇṇaṃ nāma mahārājaṭṭhānīnagaraṃ sampattā.
anya-e0702n0:885_4: Tesampi dhammarājā catūhi paccayehi saṅgahaṃ katvā saṅgharañño ārāme vasāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:886_0: Iccevaṃ marammaraṭṭhe bhagavato parinibbānato paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā sāsanassa theraparamparavasena patiṭṭhānatā veditabbā.
anya-e0702n0:887_0: Iccevaṃ marammamaṇḍale arimaddanapure arahantattheragaṇo uttarājīvattherachappadattheragaṇo sivalittheragaṇo
anya-e0702n0:888_0: Idāni arimaddananagare pañcagaṇato paṭṭhāya vijayapurajeyyapuraratanapūresu theraparamparavasena sāsanassa anukkamena āgatabhāvaṃ dassayissāmi.
anya-e0702n0:888_1: Sirikhettanagare hi ‘so yāṃ noṃ’ nāma rājā parakkamavaṃsikassa sāradassittherassa antevāsikaṃ saddhammaṭṭhitittheraṃ attano ācariyaṃ katvā pūjesi.
anya-e0702n0:889_0: Kaliyugassa catuvassādhikaaṭṭhasatakāle sirikhettanagarato āgantvā so ratanapūre rajjaṃ kāresi.
anya-e0702n0:889_1: Atha attano puttaṃ anekibhaṃ nāma rājakumāraṃ mahārāja nāmena sirikhettanagaraṃ bhuñjāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:889_7: etthantare nisinnānaṃ gihīnaṃ mama puttassa āṇā pavattatu,
anya-e0702n0:889_8: bhikkhūnaṃ mamācariyassa saddhammaṭṭhitittherassa āṇā pavattatūti niyyādesi.
anya-e0702n0:890_0: Tassaca saddhammaṭṭhitittherassa ariyavaṃsatthero mahāsāmittheroti dve sissā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:890_1: Tesu mahāsāmitthero pubbe vuttanayena sāsanavaṃsaṃ ānessāmīti sīhaḷadīpaṃ gantvā sīhaḷadīpato saddhiṃ
anya-e0702n0:890_2: pañcahi bhikkhūhi saddhammacāriṃ nāma theraṃ ānetvā abhinavasikkhaṃ gaṇhitvā sirikhettanagare sīhaḷadīpavaṃsikaṃ
anya-e0702n0:890_4: Tassa mahāsārittherassa sisso atulavaṃso nāma thero catūsu disāsu ahiṇḍitvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā sirikhettanagareyeva
anya-e0702n0:890_6: Tassa atulavaṃsattherassa sisso ratanaraṃsī nāma theroca pariyattivesārajjaṃ patvā sirikhettanagareyeva sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:890_7: Tassaca ratanaraṃ sittherassa sisso satvavadhammarājassa ācariyo abhisaṅketo nāma thero pariyattivesārajjaṃ
anya-e0702n0:890_9: Tassa pana sisso munindaghoso nāma thero atthi.
anya-e0702n0:890_10: Kaliyuge sattatādhike navasate sampatte pacchimapakkhādhikarājā sirikhettanagaraṃ abhibhavitvā nandayodhena
anya-e0702n0:890_11: nāma amaccena saddhiṃ taṃ munindaghosattheraṃ ānetvā ratanapūre patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:891_1: ahaṃ sirikhettanagaraṃ labhitvā ekaṃyeva bhikkhuṃ ekaṃyeva gihiṃ labhāmīti.
anya-e0702n0:892_0: So pana thero sāmaṇeranāmena munindaghoso nāma.
anya-e0702n0:892_1: Upasampannakāle pana mātulabhūtassa therassa nāmena upāli nāma.
anya-e0702n0:892_3: Tiriyapabbatavihāre pana vāsattā ṭhānanāmena tiriyapabbatatthero nāma.
anya-e0702n0:893_0: So kira erāvatīnadītīre catubhūmikavihāre paṭhamaṃ nisīditvā pacchā kaliyugassa vassasahasse kālesaṭṭhivassāyuko hutvā tiriyapabbatavihāre nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:893_1: Sāmaṇerakāle so jalumasyāmabhayena ratanapūrato nikkhamitvā ketumatīnagaraṃ patvā tattha tisāsanadhajattherassa
anya-e0702n0:893_3: Pāḷiaṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu atichekatāya daharakāleyevaca vessantarajātakaṃ kabyālaṅkārena bandhitvā kathanato ativiya pākaṭo ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:893_4: Tassa pana therassa sisso uccanagaravāsī mahātissattheroti saṅgirajanapade araññavāsaṃ vasitvā pariyattiṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:893_5: Tassa pana sisso reminagāme gāmavāsī candatthero nāma.
anya-e0702n0:893_8: So pana thero padumanagare sahassorodhabodhodadhigāmesu pariyattiṃ vācetvā nisīdi.
anya-e0702n0:893_9: Tassa sisso bodhodadhigāmavāsino indobhāsakalyāṇacakkavimalācārattherā sahassorodhagāmavāsino guṇasāracandasārattherā
anya-e0702n0:893_10: vaṃtumagāmavāsī varaesitthero kanninagare jararājagāma vāsī guṇasirittherocāti ime therā kalyāṇadhajattherassa
anya-e0702n0:893_11: santike puna sikkhaṃ gahetvā pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā kovidā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:894_0: Tasseva kalyāṇadhajattherassa sisso saṅgirajanapade samivanagāme nisinno dhammadharo nāma thero mahallakakāle
anya-e0702n0:894_1: padumanagare kusumamūlagāme nisīditvā ganthaṃ vācetvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhi.
anya-e0702n0:895_0: Tesu guṇasiritthero amarapuramāpakassa rañño kāle guṇābhilaṅkārasaddhammamahārājādhirājagurūti nāmalañchaṃ
anya-e0702n0:896_0: Tassa pana therassa sisso ñāṇābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājāguru nāma mahāthero.
anya-e0702n0:896_2: So pana thero sīhaḷadīpe amarapuranikāyikānaṃ pabhavo.
anya-e0702n0:896_4: Tassa sisso sūriyavaṃsābhisiripavarālaṅkāradhammasenāpati mahādhammarājādhirājaguru nāma thero amarapuradutiyamāpakassa rañño kāle saṅgharājā ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:896_6: mahādhammarājādhirājaguru mahāthero dutiyaṃ amarapuramāpakassa ratanapuṇṇamāpakassaca rañño kālesu saṅgha rājā ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:896_7: So pana ñāṇābhivaṃsadhammasenāpatimahādhammarājādhirājaguruttherassa saṅgharañño sissopi varaesittherassa sissoca ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:897_0: Ayaṃ sīhaḷadīpato sabbapacchimāgatehi saddhammacārīmahāsāmittherehi yāva amhākaṃ ācariyā theraparamparā dassanakathā.
anya-e0702n0:898_1: Chappadattheravaṃsiko saddhammakitti nāma thero jeyyapuraṃ āgantvā catudīpabhūmiṭṭhāne nisīditvā mahāariyavaṃsattherassa
anya-e0702n0:898_2: santike pariyattiṃ uggaṇhitvā tato pacchā jetavanavihāraṃ saṅkamitvā tattha nisīditvā pariyattiṃ vācetvā
anya-e0702n0:899_9: Tato paṭṭhāya kalyāṇacakka vimalācāra guṇasāra candasāra varaesī guṇasiri ñāṇābhivaṃsa ñeyyadhammābhivaṃsattherānaṃ vasena sāsanavaṃso veditabboti.
anya-e0702n0:900_0: Ayaṃ pattalaṅkassa chappadattherassa sissabhūtā saddhammakittittherato paṭṭhāya theraparamparadassanakathā.
anya-e0702n0:902_0: Evaṃ aparantaraṭṭhasaṅkhātena ekadesena sakalampi marammaraṭṭhaṃ gahetvā sāsanavaṃso dassetabbo.
anya-e0702n0:902_1: Bhagavāpi hi aparantaraṭṭhe candanavihāre vasitvā tambadīparaṭṭhe taṃtaṃdesampi iddhiyā caritvā sattānaṃ dhammaṃ desesiyevāti.
anya-e0702n0:907_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero majjhanti kattheraṃ kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ pesesi,-
anya-e0702n0:907_1: tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ pabhiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n0:907_2: Ettha ca kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ nāma cīnaraṭṭhasamīpe tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0702n0:907_3: Teneva hi adhunā kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino cinaraṭṭhavāsinoca manussā aravāḷassa nāma nāgarājassa uppajjanakālato
anya-e0702n0:907_4: paṭṭhāya yāvajjatanā nāgarūpaṃ katvā mānenti pūjenti sakkaronti,
anya-e0702n0:908_0: Soca majjhantikattheropi catūhi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ attha pañcamo hutvā pāṭaliputtato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā himavati aravāḷadahassa upari otari.
anya-e0702n0:908_1: Tena kho pana samayena kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sassapākasamaye aravāḷo nāma nāgarājā aravāḷadahe nisīditvā
anya-e0702n0:908_2: karakavassaṃ nāma vassāpetvā sassaṃ harāpetvā mahāsamuddaṃ pāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:908_3: Teroca aravāḷadahassa upari otaritvā aravāḷadahapiṭṭhikaṃ caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
anya-e0702n0:908_4: Nāgamāṇavakā taṃ disvā aravāḷassa nāgarājassa ārocesuṃ, -
anya-e0702n0:908_5: mahārāja eko chinnabhinnapaṭadharo bhaṇḍukāsāvavasano amhākaṃ udakaṃ dūsetīti.
anya-e0702n0:908_6: Tadā pana thero attānaṃyeva nāgānaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0702n0:908_7: Nagarājā tāvadeva kodhābhibhūto nikkhamitvā theraṃ disvā makkhaṃ assahamāno antalikkhe anekāni bhiṃsanakāni nimmini.
anya-e0702n0:908_17: ko ayaṃmuṇḍako chinnabhinnapaṭadharotiādīhi pharusavacanehi theraṃ santajjeti,
anya-e0702n0:908_18: etha gaṇhatha hanatha niddhamatha imaṃ samaṇanti nāgabalaṃ āṇāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:909_0: Thero sabbaṃ taṃ bhiṃsanakaṃ attano iddhibalena paṭibāhitvā nāgarājānaṃ āha,–
anya-e0702n0:910_0: Sadevakopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0702n0:911_0: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:912_0: Sacepi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabba, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0702n0:916_0: Evaṃ vutte nāgarājā vihatānubhāvo nipphalavāyāmo dukkhī dummano ahosi.
anya-e0702n0:917_0: Taṃ thero taṅkhaṇānurūpāya dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā tīsu saraṇesu
anya-e0702n0:917_1: pañcasuca sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi saddhiṃ caturāsītiyā nāgasahassehi.
anya-e0702n0:917_2: Aññepi bahū himavantavāsino yakkhāca gandhabbāca kumbhaṇḍāca therassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā saraṇesuca sīlesuca patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:917_3: Pañcakopi yakkho saddhiṃ bhariyāya yakkhiniyā pañcahica puttasatehi paṭhame phale patiṭṭhito.
anya-e0702n0:917_4: Athāyasmā majjhanti katthero sabbenāgayakkharakkhase āmantetvā evamāha,-
anya-e0702n0:918_0: Mādāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
anya-e0702n0:919_0: Sassaghātañca mā kattha, sukhakāmā hi pāṇino;
anya-e0702n0:920_0: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhanti.
anya-e0702n0:921_0: Te sabbepi sādhu bhanteti therassa vacanaṃ paṭissuṇitvā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:921_2: Atha nāgarājā attano ratanamayaṃ pallaṅkaṃ āharāpetvā therassa paññapesi.
anya-e0702n0:921_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhavāsino āgantvā theraṃ disvā amhākaṃ nāgarājatopi thero mahiddhikataroti therameva vanditvā nisinnā.
anya-e0702n0:921_9: Tato pabhuti ca kasmīragandhāro yāvajjetanā kāsāvapajjotā isivātapaṭivātāeva.
anya-e0702n0:923_0: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahūti.
anya-e0702n0:924_0: Adhunā pana kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhe sāsanassa atthaṅgatassaviya sūriyassa obhāso na paññāyati,
anya-e0702n0:924_1: tasmā tattha sāsanassa patiṭṭhāne vitthārena vattabbakiccaṃ natthīti.
anya-e0702n0:928_1: Idāni yathāvuttamātikāvasena mahiṃsakaraṭṭhasāsanavaṃsakathāmaggaṃ vattuṃ okāso anuppatto,
anya-e0702n0:929_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahārevattheraṃ mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ pesesi,-
anya-e0702n0:929_1: tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n0:930_0: Soca attapañcamo hutvā mahiṃsakamaṇḍalaṃ agamāsi paccantimesu janapadesu pañcavaggo gaṇo alaṃ upasampadakammāyāti maññamāno.
anya-e0702n0:933_0: Adhunā pana tattha sāsanassa abbhehiviya paṭicchannassa sūriyassa okāso dubbalo hutvā paññāyati.
anya-e0702n0:938_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero mahādhammarakkhittheraṃ mahāraṭṭhaṃ pesesi,-
anya-e0702n0:938_1: tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesīti.
anya-e0702n0:939_0: Mahādhammarakkhitattheroca attapañcamo hutvā mahāraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahānāradakassapajātakakathāya mahāraṭṭhake
anya-e0702n0:940_0: Mahāraṭṭhaṃ isi gantvā, so mahā dhammarakkhito;
anya-e0702n0:942_0: Tattha kira manussā pubbe aggihutādimicchākammaṃ yebhuyyena akaṃsu.
anya-e0702n0:942_2: Tato paṭṭhāya tattha manussā jātaka kathaṃ yebhuyyena sotuṃ ativiya icchanti.
anya-e0702n0:942_4: Visesato pana vassantarajātakakathaṃ te manussā bahūhi dātabbavatthūhi pūjetvā suṇanti.
anya-e0702n0:943_1: teneva syāmaraṭṭhavāsinopi bhikkhū gahaṭṭhāca yebhuyyena sotuṃ icchantīti.
anya-e0702n0:943_2: Mahādhammarakkhitattheropi mahāraṭṭhavāsīhi saddhiṃ sakalasyāmaraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ dhammaṃ desesi,
anya-e0702n0:944_3: Tathā hi nāgasenattheropi yonakaraṭṭhe vasitvā syāmaraṭṭhādīsupi sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0702n0:944_5: gantvā tato punāgantvā syāmaraṭṭhe sokkatayanagaraṃ patvā tattha nisīditvā sāsanaṃ paggaṇhitvā pacchā
anya-e0702n0:944_7: Evaṃ yonakaraṭṭhe sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ syāmādīsupi ṭhitaṃyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0702n0:945_0: Buddhassa bhagavato parinibbānato dvisatādhikānaṃ dvinnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ upari navutime vassa sīhaḷadīpe
anya-e0702n0:945_1: rajjaṃ pattassa kittissirirājasīhamahārājassa abhisekato tatiye vasse teneva kittissirirājasīhamahāraññā
anya-e0702n0:945_5: Evaṃ mahānagarayonakalyāmaraṭṭhesu sāsanaṃ thiraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhatīti veditabbanti.
anya-e0702n0:950_0: Tatiyasaṅgītāvasāne hi mahāmoggaliputtatissatthero majjhimattheraṃ cinaraṭṭhaṃ pesesi,-
anya-e0702n0:950_1: tvaṃ etaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā ettha sāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpehīti.
anya-e0702n0:951_0: Majjhimattheroca kassapagottarena aḷakarevattherena dundabhiyattherena mahārevattherenaca saddhiṃ himavantappadese
anya-e0702n0:951_1: pañcacīnaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā dhammacakkappavattanasuttantakathāyataṃ desaṃ pasādetvā asītipāṇakoṭiyo maggaphalaratanāni
anya-e0702n0:954_0: Tattha kira manussā yebhuyyena candīparamīsvārānaṃ yakkhānaṃ pūjaṃ karonti.
anya-e0702n0:954_1: Teneva te pañca therā tesaṃ yakkhasenaṃ pakāsayitvā dhammaṃ desesuṃ.
anya-e0702n0:954_2: Kasmīragandhāraraṭṭhaṃ pana kadāci kadāci cīnaraṭṭhindassa vijitaṃ hoti,
anya-e0702n0:955_0: Cīranaṭṭhe pana bhagavato sāsanaṃ dubbalaṃyeva hutvā aṭṭhāsi,
anya-e0702n0:955_2: Teneva idāni tattha katthaciyeva sāsanaṃ chāyāmattaṃva paññāyati,
anya-e0702n0:968_0: Koci ettheva doso ce, paññāyati sucittakā;
anya-e0702n0:969_0: Taṃ khamantu ca suddhiyā, gaṇhantu yuttikaṃ haveti.
